Sentinel: If you choose to go to Klaipeda, I recommend taking the Shadow Forest Road.{nl}The deep woods are dangerous, so try to stay away from there if you can.
Man in Hiding
F-Finally...! Has help arrived?{nl}Huh?! It's just a kid? Hey... Are there still Vubbes outside?
Ugh. Go away! Don't talk to me! We'll get caught by the Vubbes!{nl}This is my place so leave!
What? Don't lie to me! I can smell the Vubbes from here.{nl}You can't fool an adult! Go away! Do not come near this barrel!
F-Finally...! Has help arrived?{nl}Huh?! It's just a kid? What are you looking at? Close the lid and move along!{nl}
What's that paper you're holding? It looks familiar...{nl}Let me see that! What are you doing? Hey, there's an adult speaking to you!
This paper, it's mine! I'm never giving it away again!!{nl}It's... not something you need - I'll just rip it apart. There.
Sheesh, that's lame...
After all the goddesses had vanished, these dreams were one of the first things that came up.{nl}Maybe one of these people will be the one who brings the goddesses back.
Soldier Blak
Be warned!{nl}Monsters are attacking, so all civilians must evacuate!{nl}Why are those civilians in the military zone anyway?{nl}
Ah, so you are the Revelator! I'm sorry, I didn't recognize you.{nl}Monsters are attacking the supply base at the moment.{nl}I need to get some important rations out from the base. Please help me!
It was peaceful not too long ago, but now they are coming in groups.{nl}What's happening exactly?
Even so, I felt uneasy...{nl}Who knew that they'd attack in such an absurd manner?
The rations are in the First Supply Warehouse, which you can get to using the road {nl}on the upper side. Please bring back whatever leftovers you find...
I wrote down who Sparnas is. Maybe it will be useful in the future.{nl}Though I may not appear so right now, I was a biologist four years ago.
Please pass this report to Luders.{nl}He is probably at the Center Supply Camp.
Officer Luders
Ah, you must be the so called Revelator. Nice to meet you.{nl}Is this Blak's report?{nl}
Hmm... Is that so?{nl}It appears they simply destroyed the supplies and ran away. But even if Chupacabras had wings, {nl}surely they can't do something like that.{nl}
This isn't enough.{nl}I am sorry, but please bring us Moody's report from Amzina Curved Path.
I feel better since Luders is here.
Soldier York
The Siaulambs are crossing the road. I am in a panic myself, and I don't know what to do.{nl}I'm sure Luders won't allow this to happen... What should we do?
Do you think the problem will be resolved just by defeating Sparnas?
Thanks to your help, I think I can hold myself together.{nl}But... won't this kind of thing happen again? What should I do then...?

Sparnas? We don't have a clear answer about it.{nl}It just appeared from the sky without any signs and destroyed all the supplies we had. Then, it {nl}quickly disappeared. We got headaches just hearing its cries.
The place I just talked about is the Second Supply Warehouse.{nl}It is depressing to think how these kinds of things will be recurring in the future.

Take it. I made some bait from old grains in the supplies.{nl}I will lure it from up there, so you stay here. Sparnas will definitely appear at one of these {nl}two places. Don't let it escape. Destroy it for sure.{nl}
We may not get a second chance if we don't defeat it this time.{nl}It doesn't seem like they're idiots.
I heard the sound of fighting so I came in a hurry. Did you defeat it?{nl}I only spotted the Siaulambs at my spot.{nl}Thank you. You have performed a meritorious deed.
Adjutant General Paulina
We should recover the stolen supplies.{nl}We can't call ourselves soldiers of the kingdom if we don't do anything about it.{nl}
The stolen supplies were taken by the Siaulambs in every Supply Warehouse, {nl}recover the supplies and bring them to Volda.
I feel so fed up having to endure this all the time. Reinforcements should be coming soon.{nl}But what can we expect from such an incompetent kingdom?
Adjutant General Volda
Thank you very much, but you must be late for other matters.{nl}Besides we can't just sit here and wait. We plan to keep attacking.
Secret Guardian
The goddess already foresaw this.{nl}Nothing can escape from her vision.
Liaison Officer Niels
Hello.{nl}Have you seen an old man who has lost his way?{nl}His name is Jonas.{nl}
You haven't seen him?{nl}Now, which direction would that feeble old fellow have wandered off towards?
Jonas is a descendant of the family that has been protecting this Royal Mausoleum.{nl}He is a very important person to our lab team so please take good care of him.
Archivist Jonas
Our family has been waiting for you for a long time.{nl}It is time to give you something that we have been protecting for quite a while.
It is good to hear that Jonas has regained his consciousness.{nl}You are the person who casted the light signal, right?{nl}
Ahylas has come to meet whoever lit the signal.{nl}Meet him downstairs.
We haven't heard any news from Kepeck for a long time, not since we sent him supplies.{nl}We don't have enough people to form a search team, so please help us find him.
Historian Viode
Always be prepared for monster attacks.{nl}Especially in places like here.
Mercenary Mirta
}Didn't I already warn you?{nl}Be careful next time.
Historian Kepeck
Niels must have sent you.{nl}Well, since you're in a hurry, document it yourself and take it back to Niels.
If you go straight, take the road to your right and cross the bridge, {nl}you will see the artifacts of the Great King Zachariel.{nl}Archive them and take it back to Niels. He will understand.
So these are Kepeck's notes... Mercenary Mirta was looking for this.{nl}You helped confirm the safety of two individuals. Thank you for your efforts.
Ahylas Jonas
Now take the unsealing stone and go to Broken Pillar Canyon. {nl}The Disciple of Gustas will teach you how to release the seal there.
Were you not guided yet?{nl}Take it to the Disciple of Gustas in Broken Pillar Canyon.{nl}It is made to let only the chosen one enter.
Disciple of Gustas
Did you release the seal of Pagasa Cliff?{nl}You have to start from that seal.
Words engraved into a rock
Do not touch or push the rock.
I was waiting for you.{nl}The next seal is located on the way to the Collapsed Sanctum.
You don't know how eagerly we have waited for this moment.{nl}We really wanted to meet you.
Gustas Jonas
It's you.{nl}You are much more gallant than what I had imagined.
Soldier Alan
Are you the new recruit?{nl}I received a patrolling order, but I guess you can go my behalf.
You're good for a newbie.{nl}I have a memory of something horrible happening there once, so I don't want to go.
I'm remembering something...
}You know that we are dispatched here to defeat Gaigalas, right?{nl}Rookie. Can you take this report to Commander Wallace?
Commander Wallace
Why did you bring this report without Alan coming?{nl}Are you a new recruit or something?
I can return home after Gaigalas is defeated.{nl}Well, I'd like to go home as soon as possible.
Commander Wallace is at Bird Footprint Junction.
I don't care how good you are. You are new here.{nl}This is an order. Bring me some sap from Kepa Raiders.
Soldiers these days, they lack guts.{nl}I hope you'll be a good influence to them.
It's clear that we will win this battle.{nl}Why? Because the Owls are helping.
Kepa Raiders are near Ianutis Waterfall.{nl}To defeat Gaigalas, we will surely need them.
Soldier Weiz
Hey, rookie, are you on a break?{nl}Get some fat from Duckys in Lengvas Garden.
We will lure Gaigalas using Ducky Fat.{nl}Hey rookie, don't loaf around, alright?
Today will be the last day for Gaigalas.{nl}Are you ready, rookie?
Next, we will get leather from Cronewts in Lengvas Garden.{nl}Hurry, soldier.
We will win for sure this time.{nl}The goddesses are on our side.
You are pretty good for a rookie.{nl}It's disorganized here at the moment, so you can keep those ingredients for now.{nl}
Get to know our soldiers while I make preparations for the battle.{nl}I will call you before we confront Gaigalas.
When we burn the Ducky Fat, Gaigalas will appear after smelling the odor.{nl}Lengvas Garden will be a good place to burn it.
My heart is pounding.{nl}I feel like my soul is throbbing with it.
Old Owl Sculpture
There is no one in this forest. Why are you here?{nl}
Gaigalas?{nl}Defeating it without any assistance will be difficult.
I have seen many deaths here.{nl}And I don't want to see any more sacrifices.
I need Kepa Raider Sap and Cronewt Leather.
Why do you have that?{nl}Hand it to me and I will make a Memory Fragment.
With this Memory Fragment, I will revive the memories of our sleeping comrades.
It will be difficult to defeat it without a Memory Fragment.{nl}Please bring me Infro Holder Horns.
How come you have all these ingredients?
Those are people who are already gone from this world. {nl}They are repeating what happened back then because of their anger for Gaigalas.
We can calm them if we defeat Gaigalas.{nl}Please go see the Worrying Owl.
Worrying Owl Sculpture
Please help me wake my sleeping comrades and complete the magic of that day.{nl}With the Memory Fragment.
They may become satiated.{nl}I will stand here while remembering my comrades.
You will find Gaigalas when you go to Ishimtini Access Way.{nl}Please avenge the fallen soldiers.
I was in an isolated place so I did not fall asleep.{nl}But, watching it all was painful for me.
My comrades were attacked while they were trying to help the soldiers.
(Jonas recovered awareness after drinking the medicine.)
Archaeologist Dezic
I am looking for my assistant named Airine.{nl}Can you defeat the monsters nearby so I can go look for her?
I told her not to get excited even if she finds something.{nl}And yet she did it again.
Thanks.{nl}I'll go look for Airine.
Technician Heinen
}This cable car can only be ridden by those with a permit. I'm afraid I have to tell you to turn back {nl}towards Vienesa Highlands.
However, if you defeat the troublesome monsters around this area, I'll think about it.
}Isn't it better to use the cable car rather than getting injured passing through the monsters? {nl}Of course, this is if you can ride the cable car.
Much better than I expected.{nl}I want to propose a deal to you.
I'll let you keep using the cable car if you destroy the strange seal at Nutoles Cliff.{nl}The monsters seem to be increasing in numbers because of that seal.
As promised, you can use the cable car as much as you want.{nl}Just tell William over there or Cyneburg on the other side that I gave my permission.
That barrier... Hmm. When exactly did it form?{nl}I know it has been there for quite some time now, but I can't remember for how long exactly.
I am certain that barrier was responsible for the increasing number of monsters lately.{nl}
We don't have many soldiers guarding this area.{nl}Who in their right mind would come here in this day and age?{nl}
Rolandas Jonas
No one knows what the Great King Zachariel tried to protect.{nl}And I'm sure that we're not the only ones who want to solve that mystery.
Hurry, use the Great King's Key to release the seals.{nl}You should know what to do next afterwards.
I found Airine, but I don't know how to rescue her.{nl}She is imprisoned in Rodoma 2nd Ruins, I can't rescue her myself...
Assistant Airine
I can't move because of the barrier.{nl}Please break the three barriers in Rodoma Ruins.
Are you not done yet? Ah, geez...
I didn't expect that I would be taken into this kind of thing.{nl}Oh, the mess I caused from chasing that boy.
Mercenary Glen
So many researchers are disappearing these days.{nl}I'm trying to find clues by defeating some Sauga. Can you help us?
The Saugas split their loot fairly among themselves.{nl}Maybe we can find some clues from them.
Fortunately they are very old.{nl}So that means these cases are not due to monsters.
This place is very dangerous; many have gone missing due to monsters or missteps.{nl}However, that is not what interests me.{nl}
When those people disappeared, no one close to them noticed.{nl}It's as if memories about those who disappeared are erased. Interesting, isn't it?{nl}
Please defeat all monsters nearby to prevent anything from happening.{nl}There were reports that the monsters at the 1st Architects' Site had turned violent.
Splendid.{nl}We will be safe for now.
Monsters are coming!{nl}They probably found out I was released.
The goddesses have sent you?{nl}I never thought that you would protect me.{nl}
Where did that huge scorpion go? This is very bad!
I should go see Dezic.{nl}I hope to see you again in the future.
Someone must have done something strange to the monsters protecting the Royal Mausoleum.{nl}What were they thinking?
Sir, get a hold of yourself. Sir!
New Researcher
I lost my important research materials at the Abandoned Old Workshop.{nl}The monsters must have taken them... Should I just leave them behind?
I am elated that I get to see the Royal Mausoleum myself, but the monsters... they are frightening.
Thank you so much.{nl}You should also check the Records Repository.
The entrance to the Royal Mausoleum is hidden within this gigantic canyon somewhere.{nl}The start of the canyon begins here.
Many experts have come here to conduct research on the Royal Mausoleum.{nl}Maybe we can find some clues about Medzio Diena here.
Why are there so many monsters in the canyon when there is so little plant life around?
What happened to my request? Is it not done yet?
Look closely at the ground.{nl}It may have fallen down.
Hmm, only these ones?{nl}Well, thank you for finding this much at least.{nl}I can just copy the others from the beginning again.
Niels sent you too?{nl}I am not going. I have to research these wild flowers.{nl}
I guess what I saw was an illusion.{nl}I must reward you for protecting a mineralogist like me.{nl}
Yes.{nl}Bring me my archives from Niels.
Jonas told you to bring his archives?{nl}Okay. In return, please bring him some medicine.{nl}
The medicine will help him ease his mind.{nl}Davio at the right side of the Excavation Camp has the medicine.
Jonas is the head of the family that protects the Royal Mausoleum of the Great King Zachariel.{nl}He was once very healthy, but these days he is old and weak.{nl}
It was after Jonas went out to a visit with his servant.{nl}Jonas was found with dementia and the servant has gone missing even until today.
Please take good care of Jonas.{nl}It would be a big problem if he got hurt.
Davio is at the right side of the camp.{nl}I hope the medicine will work well.
Finally, I remember everything.{nl}I am the head of the family that protects the Royal Mausoleum... Who are you?{nl}
Revelator. If this is the will of the goddess, then you must be qualified.{nl}You have a job to do, so follow me to Beacon Hill Pass.
I have made Niels and you worry...
I will lead the way and you will handle any monsters we encounter.{nl}I am counting on you.
The time is now. Please go on ahead to Beacon Hill Pass.
I am sure that you are qualified for this.{nl}Goddess Laima has led all these.
Finally the hidden treasure can be passed down to someone.{nl}I regret not recognizing you sooner due to my senility.
Great King Zachariel told us to bestow his hidden treasure upon a qualified person.{nl}You can check whether you are qualified with the Eyes of the Great King.
We have one more responsibility besides protecting the Royal Mausoleum.{nl}And that is to protect the royal inheritance until a qualified person comes.{nl}
We have no idea what exactly the hidden treasure is.{nl}The king just told us to protect it so we are just following his order.
Medicine Dealer
Hmm... Well, there's a herb that only grows around Metos Field.{nl}Please bring me it.
Metos Field would be the best place to wake up one's consciousness. Especially for an old man.
Good job. You're pretty sharp, aren't you?{nl}
Alright, it's done.{nl}Take this to Davio.
Merchant Davio
I brought that old man's medicine. {nl}But I spent a great deal of effort getting it. I ought to charge you more.{nl}
The gold that Lichenclops have in this town will be enough.{nl}Bring those to the Medicine Dealer in Kapas Highway.
This will be enough. Davio sent you, right?{nl} I still need one more ingredient to make the medicine truly effective.
To make the medicine, I needed to find the cause of Jonas' symptoms and it drove me crazy.{nl}Funnily enough, it was caused by a spell that was used long ago.{nl}
I heard a rumor that the Great King Zachariel erased the memories of all workers after {nl}building the Royal Mausoleum. That should be the spell casted on Jonas, though he is also a bit {nl}senile.
It was tough to get that old man's medicine.{nl}But, there's nothing I cannot get.
It will be completed once you melt it in the honey that you have. Take it with you.
That medicine works well. Make him swallow it somehow.
You're late.{nl}Did you bring my archive?
Go to the Abandoned Old Workshop.{nl}Some old man is wandering around there. I think it's Jonas.
What is that? It smells like mead!
I feel dizzy.{nl}What am I doing here anyway?
I am relieved you found me.{nl}When the monsters were chasing after me, I lost my belongings and all the materials.{nl}At the very least, could you find the scattered materials?
I don't have much to say as a humble mercenary.{nl}Although I was okay even on Medzio Diena, I am certain this place is cursed.{nl}
How long has it been since I came here?{nl}Where is Mirta and who are you?
I'm trying to remember something but it keeps fading whenever I get close.
Vaidotas
That smell.. I think the purifying device in the mine is broken.{nl}We better repair it quickly. The kidnapped villagers might suffocate.

Do you know about the legend of Cunningham?{nl}The legend states that a great demon was sealed here in the Crystal Mine.{nl}There is a book with more details about it at the Mine Worker's Resting Place in Crystal Mine 2F.{nl}

Anyway, my guess is that the demon is re-awakening and is controlling the Vubbes.{nl}The bishop's dream and the Legend of Cunningham... I feel they may be a sign that something{nl}huge is about to happen.{nl}
Only the goddess would know if it will be hope or despair.{nl}
The purifier can be easily fixed by anyone, but it may be hard to find the parts needed.{nl}In that case, use the compass that I gave you to search for them.{nl}
Well then, I have some things to do so I will meet you at 3F of the Crystal Mine.{nl}In the name of the goddess, I pray for success in your struggles.
If you can't find the parts needed to repair the purifier, use the compass I gave you.{nl}It'll help you find them.
Village Aunt
You've come to save us? Right?
It's alright, We are going to be okay now!
Village Girl
Please save us. Please...
Please release me. Please...
Mr. Juan
I get furious whenever I see those Vubbes who ruined my hometown.{nl}That's why I want to help people like you who fight against the Vubbes.
I would have left already if this wasn't my hometown.{nl}Where on earth were all the Vubbes hiding before they crawled out?
Pharmacist Lady
Thanks for your help last time.{nl}Without you, I would have never gotten this much ingredients.
Perhaps the person that the goddess sent was you.{nl}You are the most merciful person I have ever seen among the Revelators.
Soldier Jace
I will protect this village for my dead comrades.
Even if the world changes, I will never forgive the Vubbes.
Soldier Edgar
These are the rations that we gathered from East Siauliai Woods.{nl}I will never, ever lose them again. Ever.
Thanks to you, I received this much food.{nl}I am relieved.
Knight Commander Uska
Is this slate the evidence of salvation?{nl}It just looks like an old slate to me.
Ask the mayor of the Miners' Village about a way to Leaf Veil Plateau.{nl}I will send the message to the Paladin Master first. {nl}May the blessings of the goddess be with you.
It would be good to ask the Bokor Master to interpret this slate.{nl}She lives at the end of Klaipeda's Residential Area so go pay her a visit.
Use your time wisely.{nl}No one else fully knows your future.
So you finally returned.{nl}What did the Bokor Master tell you?
I'm also curious about the girl who cracked the seal.{nl}This is not a seal that can easily be broken.
If the Bokor Master told you that I would know it..{nl}There's one place that comes to mind.{nl}
The high gardens that the goddess mentioned could be an area within Leaf Veil Plateau. {nl}I heard the Paladin Master is there, uploading a long term promise.
Miners' Village Mayor
Welcome. Aren't you our town's savior?{nl}
Leaf Veil Plateau, huh? If you take the road between the two bridges below, you'll reach {nl}Silverstream Gorge.
So this revelation is from goddess Laima and we have to collect all these for the goddess {nl}to regain her powers?{nl}That is amazing.
Oh, please do not reveal the fact that a revelation has been found unless it is absolutely necessary.{nl}Doing so may only create confusion if the rumors spread.
Ah, the report.{nl}So you see, those Siaulagos were doing something strange to the supplies, {nl}then they started running away when Sparnas appeared.{nl}
I was spotted by those Siaulagos as they were running away, so I fought them...{nl}And as you can see, I lost. The report, I mean.{nl}Aren't they a pain to deal with?
If you find the report, please hand it over to Luders right away.{nl}Though I am terrified to think about what those bastards did to our supplies.
Yes, after seeing Moody's report, I am confident that they had put something in our supplies to{nl}lure Sparnas. Perhaps some Old Grains that the birds go crazy on.
The soldiers on patrol found the place where the Siaulambs' stolen goods are stored.{nl}How about we steal them back?{nl}Let's make it known that we're not as weak as they think.{nl}
You should fight fire with fire.{nl}We will keep attacking until they fully realize that they've made a mistake.
I hope that we won't be troubled with from now on.{nl}Thanks for your efforts.
The location is Ziedo Pond.{nl}I heard there are many Siaulambs, so be careful.
I have not heard anything else about the bishop's dream.{nl}Sorry, I can't be of much help.
Klaipeda Guard Captain
Go ahead to Klaipeda.{nl}Commander Uska is waiting for you in Klaipeda Central Plaza.{nl}I heard the bishop also had a dream about the goddess... it appears to concern that day.
Klaipeda Guard
Thank you for making your way here.{nl}If there is still this much left even after Sir Titas handled it himself, can you imagine how {nl}it was before?
Mercenary Toby
Do you want to do a simple task for me?{nl}I'm a known face so it will be hard for me to do it myself.
If you don't want to, then you don't have to.{nl}There are plenty of people around who can do this.
You passed.{nl}The strength you possess is tremendous.
It's definitely worth it.{nl}Even if the King spent all his assets building the Mausoleum, its size is huge.
Judging from this, these equipment are not permitted.{nl}Do not leave them lying around.{nl}
Okay. Bring me more evidence that those people are making counterfeits.{nl}Do whatever it takes.
I am looking for evidence of artifact forgery.{nl}Your first task will be to bring me any illegal digging tools that you find.
Of course you should show us your skills.{nl}Defeating Desert Chupacabras or Zinutes will be enough to prove yourself.
Supply Officer
Thank you for your help.{nl}I think this will be enough.{nl}
)}{nl}If you have time, please tell our troops to assemble.{nl} If you choose not to, you may just go ahead to Klaipeda.
Scout
Go back, it's dangerous!{nl}Kepas will soon be marching in.
Oh, you're a Revelator. It must be fate that we are to fight together. {nl}Let me give you the inside scoop.
You mentioned that we need to assemble, right?{nl}Help me find some missing belongings and I'll go as soon as I can.
Have you found my belongings yet? I can't go back without them.
Thank you. You found it sooner than I expected.{nl}
If you follow the road to the north, you will find the Search Scout.{nl}Good luck.
Laimonas
Have you ever offered worship to the Statue?{nl}If not, I'd really recommend it.
That depends on which goddess it is.{nl}If you follow the road to the right you will find the Statue of Goddess Zemyna.
I do worry that the monsters might harm the Goddess Statue.
I am happy that the statue is unharmed.{nl}The monsters here know to fear the goddess.{nl}
Go down the Shadow Forest Road and you should arrive at Klaipeda shortly.{nl}Well then, may the blessings of the goddess be with you.
Please do me a favor if you are headed to Klaipeda.{nl}It's not easy to go back and forth from Klaipeda because of the Infrorocktors nowadays.
Maybe taking care of the statues will make the goddesses return sooner...
Follow the road on the left at the camp crossroads.{nl}{-scp SCR_DIALOG_NPC_ANIM(
)} You'll meet the troops right away.
)}Alright, good job.{nl}You'll arrive at Klaipeda shortly if you follow the Shadow Forest Road.{nl}Don't forget to drop by Sir Uska.
Battle Commander
I will have my men notify the troops to assemble.{nl}You may return to Sir Titas to let him know.
The errand shouldn't be anything too difficult.{nl}If you don't want to help, I'll send you off to Klaipeda right away.
Search Scout
It sure is a problem.{nl}I didn't know Kepas could grow that big.
Shouldn't a Revelator be heading to Klaipeda instead of hanging around here?
I feel so relieved to be stationed in the Western Woods.{nl}There are some places where you'd rather die than be stationed.
When you see a Goddess Statue, try offering your worship.{nl}Surely something nice will happen.
This is a dangerous area. What are you doing here?
Thank you.{nl}I better go report the roaming Large Kepa to Sir Titas.
Weird... That is not a type of monster you'd face in a place like this.{nl}It must be hard to travel around.
Assemble already?{nl}That's tough. There's still a pile of missions.
First, defeat the Hanamings around here.{nl}Then, collect their petals.
Even if this wasn't about the Revelators, but the goddesses returning instead,{nl}I wouldn't abandon my mission before it was over.
Yes. This will be enough.{nl}Here is a pill that will restore your stamina instantly. I have enough of it so I will give you this {nl}as a gift.

Stamina is consumed when you move.{nl}You can recover stamina by destroying a Tree Root Crystal or by resting.{nl}But you might not have time for that when you are being chased by monsters.{nl}That's when this pill comes in handy.
I heard news from my men and was becoming worried.{nl}All is well if it ended up good.
Klaipeda Resident
{nl}When do you think the goddess is coming back?{nl}Even if I ask the Revelators, all they say is that they must go to Klaipeda...
Are you a Revelator?{nl}Didn't the goddess appear in your dream?{nl}I heard so from the soldiers.
Trooper
I wonder what the goddesses are doing...
Thank you for making your way here.{nl}I am Uska, the Knight Commander in charge of Siauliai and Klaipeda.
The Bishop also dreamed of a revelation.{nl}He told me to send the Revelators to the Crystal Mine.{nl}
Let me know when you are ready to go to the Crystal Mine.{nl}I'll tell you the location and how to get in.
The bishop told us to send the Revelators to the Crystal Mine.{nl}He said the goddess told him to do so.{nl}

But the Miners' Village is at war with the Vubbes and its entrance is limited to authorized {nl}personnel only. Knight Aras is the one managing troops in the East Siauliai Woods. {nl}You should talk to him.
Monsters have been around for a long time, {nl}but they only started becoming violent four years ago. {nl}The ones that were most affected would be the plant types. They did not exist before.{nl}
Of course, beasts were no exception.{nl}I thought the end was near when monsters that seem to have fused with demons appeared.
Knight Aras
Aren't you hurt?{nl}I appreciate that you got rid of the Poata, because it was really reckless.
You want to get into the Crystal Mine?{nl}The Miners' Village is currently at war with the Vubbes and it's very dangerous,{nl}thus I cannot permit that.
And our troops are in no condition to guard you.{nl}I'm sorry but you will have to go back.
If you can't defeat the Pokubus, you'll have to give up going into the Miners' Village.
Thank you.{nl}Do not worry, I'll keep my promise.
Outpost Sentinel

Although I'm worried about the situation in the Miners' Village, I'm not getting used to the {nl}constant fighting and resting. If only the Chupacabras could be dealt with to some degree, {nl}we would be much more well off.
Other monsters are also flooding into areas where Chupacabras live.{nl}Miners' Village is a problem on its own but there are just too many things to pay attention to.
Thank you.{nl}Your assistance really helps lift our spirits.
With your abilities, I have one more favor to ask.{nl}Can you help us drive out the Chupacabras in the supply camp too?
I'm worried for the Miners' Village, but the situation here isn't so good either. {nl}It'd be great if we could prepare some countermeasures before the number of monsters {nl}grow even further...
You're done already?{nl}I've never seen anyone as fast as you before.
I'm on a mission to find out the cause of the sudden increase in monsters in the Eastern Woods.{nl}I also act as the intermediary in supplying the Miners' Village.{nl}
There are other knights out in Miners' Village. {nl}Frankly, the battle here is taking longer than we thought, as we imagined the battle would {nl}end as soon as Aras was here.
Since you're going to help, please defeat the Giant Gray Chupacabras too.{nl}They are the culprits stealing our supplies.
Giant Gray Chupacabras should appear now that you have defeated the Chupacabras.{nl}Well then, thanks for assisting.
Thank you.{nl}Now I can finally get to work easily.
Finding the cause of the monsters is important,{nl}but I'm more worried about supplies not making it to the Miners' Village.
The movement of Weavers in the lower areas of the stream seems suspicious.{nl}Seems like they're trying to interfere with supplies to the Miners' Village.
We might have to give up our current supplies and support ourselves until the next batch of {nl}supplies arrive.
Thank you.{nl}With you helping us out like this, we will not be defeated.
Your next mission is to find the cause of the increasing number of monsters.{nl}Popolions have a big appetite, so I hope we can find a clue.

Although the Miners' Village is in trouble, given that the situation has{nl}reached the Eastern Woods, we can't assure the safety of Klaipeda.{nl}We hope the Miners' Village is putting up a good fight.
Operations Officer
Were you sent by Aras?{nl}This is a piece of Vubbe clothing. Ah... I see...
I think the Vubbes from the Miners' Village have made their way into the woods.{nl}Maybe that's also a reason behind the abnormal surge in monsters.{nl}
I better ask Aras to search for Vubbes in other regions too.{nl}In the meantime, I would like you to take a look at the upper areas.
We haven't searched the upper areas yet.{nl}Of course we should be sending troops, but I ask for your help as this is an urgent matter.
You saw a Vubbe Fighter but missed it?{nl}We also got a report of Vubbe Fighter appearing in the Southern area.{nl}
First, talk to the Search Scout by the bridge in the lower area of Bulves Farm.{nl}This will become a tedious, drawn out campaign if we let that Vubbe Fighter run loose.
So the Vubbe Fighters are the reason behind the growing number of monsters.{nl}Please find out how many Vubbe Fighters there are.{nl}
Under the circumstances, it makes sense that the monsters are controlled by the Vubbe Fighters.{nl}But deep down, you just don't want to believe it.
Following your report, there are no more Vubbe Fighters in these woods.{nl}
It appears the Vubbe Fighters have been defeated. {nl}I alerted the Search Scout at the Nudeges Felled Area.
Supply Soldier
We need Weaver Claws as a part of the supplies to be sent to Miners' Village, {nl}but we just don't have time to look for them. What do we do?
Actually, it doesn't make sense for the Supply Soldier to directly retrieve the supplies.{nl}It should have come straight from Klaipeda.
Thank you.{nl}Unexpected help always feels good.
As a matter of fact, everything would also be better if the Pokubus weren't around.{nl}We couldn't retrieve all the supplies with them running amok.
I don't know why they suddenly started to prey on the supplies.{nl}Could something be commanding them?
Thank you.{nl}I envy your ability.
Eastern Woods Search Scout
Oh, it's you.{nl}I have heard from the Operations Officer.{nl}
A Vubbe Fighter is hiding deep in the Nudeges Felled Area.{nl}We received orders to kill it, but it may be safer to wait for additional troops.
I'm just a Search Scout, but this was my first time seeing a Vubbe Fighter up close.
Amazing, you got rid of it by yourself?{nl}Report this to Aras, he'll be very pleased to hear this.
You really defeated the Vubbe Fighter alone!{nl}What a relief, now the monsters will stop growing in numbers.
Of course. As promised, I will grant you access to the Miners' Village.{nl}Please wait.
If you find any clues, let the Operations Officer in the northern area know about it.
The Miners' Village is in a dire situation.{nl}It'll take too long to organize the troops so please go ahead and support the Miners' Village.

They have low intelligence, but these monsters build groups and live as a community.{nl}They used to appear only occasionally in the deeper areas of the mines...{nl}Could they be expanding their forces?{nl}
Whatever the reason is, the Vubbes expanding their territory is a big problem.{nl}Monsters that lose their territory to the Vubbes will be forced to make their way into our base.
It's a single road from here on so you'll be able to find the people easily.{nl}
Oh, let me give you some helpful information in return for your help.{nl}The evidence of salvation that the Revelators are looking for can be found in the Closed Area.
One thing, there's something that keeps bothering me.{nl}A vague feeling of something alien.
Miner
Thank you for saving us.{nl}It's like a dream to be saved by the Revelator.{nl}
The Closed Area?{nl}If you absolutely need to get in there, gather the mysterious stones that the Vubbes carry.{nl}The Crystal Wall should open when you insert enough stones to it.
I was collecting supplies to be sent to the Miners' Village, but the monsters stole them all.{nl}
The supply boxes contain dangerous explosives so collecting them will not be an easy task.
They couldn't have gone far.{nl}It would have been better if it just exploded on the way.
Mercenary Lindt
Thank you again.{nl}I should return to my commander soon. I think I can return to him after I get some more rest.
I knew you would.{nl}One more thing, the ground near the Closed Area is weak so the entrance has been blocked {nl}for a long time.{nl}
The kidnapped people are veteran miners so they may know how to get in.{nl}Well then, may the blessings of the goddess be with you.
It wasn't long ago that I felt a strange power while performing experiments in the Closed Area.{nl}It was different from the mana that we know but it was very warm.{nl}
But some force did not allow me to approach, as if it had an owner already.{nl}A few days after the incident, the bishop dreamed about the evidence of salvation.{nl}
Perhaps the evidence of salvation is the force I felt...{nl}That's what I think.
All I see are monsters and we're out of supplies.{nl}I'm also curious how the battle situation is in Miners' Village.
Until I'm assigned a new task, I'm thinking of going back to my duties as a search scout.{nl}Observing the monsters, you know.
The Miners' Village is under siege and entrance is prohibited for civilians.{nl}Remember that we can't guarantee your safety if you do not get my permission.
You have to cheer up.{nl} Even Aras is holding on.
Goddess Zemyna overlooks the earth.{nl}There are rumors that the goddesses have abandoned us, but that's nonsense.{nl}The statues still shine beautifully when you pray to them.
Vubbes suddenly came pouring in into the Siauliai Woods from the Crystal Mines.{nl}Thus, the Miners' Village situated between the Mines and the Woods became a battlefield.{nl}

For safety reasons, I can't permit entrance to the Miners' Village. {nl}Of course it would be a different story if your skill are good enough to ensure your own safety {nl}without the guards' protection.
Gosh, that could have been really dangerous.{nl}That huge thing was hiding so well.
It's very important to study the monsters at times like this.{nl}It's like weather forecasts where you try to understand the source to see what trends will happen.
I am certain that the Leaf Bugs at Uolos Farm stole them.{nl}They have stolen from us before.
Send my regards to the Guard Captain when you meet him.
In order to test if your skills are good enough to enter the Miners' Village,{nl}I need you to help us solve a problem we have.{nl}
First, take back Bulves Farm from the Pokubus.{nl}This should be a fairly easy task.
(There seems to be a gap in the rock where you can insert something.)
Let's search Bulves Farm first.{nl}But don't chase them or something as it can be dangerous.
You're making me wonder if you're an envoy of the goddess.{nl}Anyway, the supply camp is located further below the farm.
The Leaf Veil Plateau you are looking for is further in from the Silverstream Gorge.{nl}You can get to Silverstream Gorge by going down from the middle of Twin Bridge.
The Crystal Mine has become infested with Vubbes, so be sure to stay together in groups of five.
Equipment Merchant
Even at times like this, I struggle to find the best items I can. You can't go easy when dealing{nl}with your customers.

Monsters probably know I can tell which items are good as they attack and steal from people {nl}who buy items from me. I feel sorry for those who were attacked but it also proves that the {nl}items are worth it.
The monsters never raided Klaipeda, but with Sir Uska gone, it's hard to be at ease.{nl}You have you watch out for yourself at times like this.
I want to travel with a single weapon in hand like an adventurer... Yeah there's no way I could.

If you listen to the soldiers, they'll use terms only they can understand to make things sound {nl}complicated. But when I ask my soldier friend, he says it's not like they are talking about anything {nl}important.
Be cautious of people who sell weapons from monsters without a permit.{nl}They'll try and scam you into to buying useless things or sell you things at ridiculously high prices.
Item Merchant
It's the little things you forget to buy that makes you regret when you travel.{nl}Better buy enough of them when you can.
I feel sorry for the injured. Can't we just get along with the monsters?
I'd rather stay safe and at peace with lower sales than have sales shoot up because people are{nl}worried that the monsters might attack.
I sell things that people need, but I sometimes think it would've been better if I was a healer,{nl}because that way I could be closer to the explorers to help them.
I hear strange howlings from the distance. Could they be monster sounds?
People say I'm weird and I talk too much, but I don't mind. Even if I'm as weird like they say, {nl}that doesn't mean the items I sell are weird.
Blacksmith
Hello.{nl}I can help you repair items but I can't craft new ones because I don't have the materials.{nl}Go on and choose from whatever is available.
Klaipeda Resident
It's true these are tough times, but everyone is looking out for the soldiers.
Aside from everything else, I want to eat till I'm full.{nl}You need to eat to have strength.
Why did the goddesses disappeared?{nl}Everyone is looking for where they've gone, but no one is asking why they disappeared.
I can't eat, sleep, or move about freely because of those monsters.{nl}In the old days, we used gather herbs or pick fruits in the Siauliai Woods you know.
Everyone is talking about the war wherever you go.{nl}Like who and how much people are hurt or who's assigned to where.{nl}All the stories about the war makes me sick!
I heard they will send soldiers who aren't even trained into the nest of monsters.{nl}Might as well gather the old people and make them soldiers too.
My life is just a cycle of anxiety and anger.{nl}The goddess should return soon.
There are suddenly many people who have had a revelation in their dreams.{nl}Could it be a sign that something is about to happen again?{nl}
The bishop of Klaipeda saw a goddess in his dream.{nl}Did you also have such a dream, Revelator?
Mother of a Soldier
)}My son has enlisted in the army.{nl}He said who would, if not him, at such difficult times like this.
)}Monster are growing and the forest is too chaotic for people to live in.{nl}At least, Klaipeda is safe.
)}Even if Klaipeda is safe, aren't the other cities in chaos?{nl}Putting aside the capital, Fedimian has totally collapsed except for the Divine District.
)}It's a good thing that my son accomplished his dream of becoming a solder...{nl}But the monsters are rising and I'm worried he might get hurt.
)}Maybe Klaipeda is where the goddess has bestowed her blessings.{nl}I hope the blessings will also reach my son in the army.
)}My husband used to be a miner. I am relieved that he isn't anymore.{nl}It would be too dangerous if the monsters raid at times like this, wouldn't it?
)}Many refugees came from fallen towns.{nl}Our food supplies are running short but we still have to help each other.
I may not bring in the best of items, but shouldn't providing essentials be a skill of its own?{nl}I will work hard to get through these tough times.
I think the best weapons and armor are the ones that you get used to over a long period of time.{nl}In order to do so, you must first start by buying good items.
I used to pack my things and go around traveling in the past but I guess that would be {nl}problematic now...
Try using a variety of weapons. Eventually, you'll find one that fits you.
The armor that suits you will guarantee your safety.
A single armor piece can mean the difference between life and death. Look around to see if you {nl}have everything you need.
It's free to look around.
Look around and see if you need anything.
Look around carefully. You might find something that can help you.
Sometimes the things you are looking at without any thought may actually fit you very well, {nl}so take a look and think about it.
You can just look around. Find me anytime you need something.
We have enough items, so take a look.
You need good weapons and armor to prepare for the monsters. That is what I'm selling.
Items I have for sale are flawless. These are all new.
If you don't prepare your equipment now, you might regret it later when you're surrounded {nl}by monsters. Have a look around when you can.
I've prepared the best items I can find. The prices aren't bad either so look around.
The things I sell are good both in price and quality.
If you have the time, take a look at the items I have for sale.
I hope good items will find good owners.
This used to be a bustling shopping area. But everyone left as it became difficult to live {nl}here...
There were so many people back then that I didn't have the time for a friendly chat.
A lot of people seem to be coming thanks to Uska's recruitment notice.
You'll need a lot of preparation before going to battle against the monsters.
Times are difficult but I decided not to raise prices. Have a look.
Some monsters will mistaken things for food and swallow them. They must be really hungry.
I once encountered a monster in Siauliai Woods. I just stood still and the monster went away...{nl}I guess there are monsters that do not make the first attack on people.
I've heard that some people sell things that are dropped from those who were running away {nl}from the monsters. I don't sell stuff like that, so don't worry about that.
Everything aside, I do not lie about my items being cheap. The stuff I sell is priced just right.
Feel free to look around anytime.
Things can turn south if you don't prepare enough potions.
It's free to look around the things I sell.
How do you continue running a business if you don't make profits?
I thought about moving my business to somewhere else, but I had to stay for the people who {nl}come to me.
I don't think of making a lot of money. I just need enough to live by.
I think we have to help each other at difficult times like these. I hope I can be of help.
Can I help you? I'll show you what we have prepared.
Please feel free to come back if you need anything.
You don't necessarily have to buy things so feel free to look around.
I sold items even before the monsters appeared.
Don't you feel good just looking at the items even if you don't buy them?
You can find me anytime if you want a closer look at the items I'm selling.
What would it be like to go on an adventure fighting monsters? I was born and raised here, so {nl}I sometimes wonder how it would be in other areas.
Sometimes when I see the soldiers who protect us from the monsters, I want to give them things {nl}for free. Although it's really not easy for me to do so...
Better were the days when Commander Uska took care of Klaipeda himself.
Isn't there a way to defeat all the monsters running wild in Siauliai Woods?
I hope some skilled person could drive out all the monsters.
Living in a place where monsters are running wild outside is driving me nuts.{nl}And I can't think of going anywhere else because of the monsters...
I'd wipe out all the monsters if I had the skills.{nl}Why are the soldiers leaving the monsters alone?
I am tired of living a life running away from the monsters.
Thinking of the peaceful days in the past makes me feel like I'm dreaming.{nl}Being awake is like a very long nightmare.
I want to run away to another place if I can.{nl}Is there a future for the kingdom?
I can't sleep well nowadays.{nl}It's all because of those monsters.
To live at peace in a world where monsters are running wild... is impossible.
Does salvation even exist?{nl}Hanging on each day in hopes that the goddess will return is really miserable.
We can't go out nor can we live like this. Will we really be alright?{nl}I can't seem to find an answer no matter how much I think about it.
Getting used to a world where we live together with monsters, what could be more terrible {nl}and scary?
I heard that there are people who study monsters.{nl}What is wrong with them?{nl}Those monsters are bad creatures that could attack us at any moment.
I'm afraid that Klaipeda might become like the capital.{nl}It's already being called the fallen city, no?
Many people are afraid of Bokors for summoning zombies.{nl}But we only curse the enemies of the goddess.
Intelligence, calm judgement and cold rationality.{nl}These are the qualities required for our Cryomancers.
Fire is grace sent to us by the Goddess Gabija.{nl}You cannot become a great Pyromancer if you overlook that.
It is vain death that lies at the end for those who only seek dauntlessness.{nl}If you wish to achieve true justice, lift the shield of Peltasta.
After the goddesses disappeared, the capital was destroyed on Medzio Diena.{nl}I hope more people will become Peltastas to protect the world.
Rodelero Master
People say that the Divine District was a result of the goddess' blessing.{nl}What they don't know is that we Rodeleros also played a big role.
Squire Master
We are in chaos nowadays, but we used to live in honorable times before.{nl}Well... that's all in the past now.
Wizard Master
No matter how much magic talent you have, it all goes to waste unless you actively train it.
You must be brave in order to protect the kingdom.{nl}But for that bravery to be distinguishable from recklessness, your skills need to be adequate.
The Goddesses may be all gone but my powers are still doing fine, right?{nl}I'm sure it must be proof that Goddess Gabija is at least safe somewhere.
Elementalistenmeister
Simplicity is best.{nl}Walk the path of an Elementalist if you wish to research the source of all else.
Quarrel Shooter Master
It's painful to see people come to Klaipeda seeking refuge from the monsters.{nl}If they were Quarrel Shooters then they wouldn't have to.
Ranger Master
I heard monsters swarm in flocks outside of Klaipeda.{nl}If I could improve my skill instead of attacking them one by one...
Sapper Master
People shouldn't do things they'll regret.{nl}Four years ago on Medzio Diena, I lost even those whom I wanted to ask for forgiveness.{nl}
Archer Master
Defeating enemies one by one from a distance is the beauty of the bow and arrow.{nl}It doesn't matter how many shots you have to take, the shots that actually hit are the ones {nl}that count, right?
Priest Master
It does a priest no good to doubt the goddesses, for only faith can support a Priest.
Sadhu Master
Truthful and divine entities are inherent in all things.
Rexipher
You're late. {nl}So, you want to save the woman?
Technician Orion
The grounds at the throat of Geltonas tremble from the huge mouth, carrying death.{nl}Shaking like thunder. The huge mouth could bite one's head off.{nl}
I think this phrase indicates very dangerous monsters.{nl}I think we should've just ripped up the note to begin with.
Please use this bait on the way to Geltonas Highland.{nl}If you hide in the trees it shouldn't be long before a monster comes out.
Good job.{nl}Let's get moving before any stronger monsters find us.
If this note is true, we might die at any time.{nl}By the way, what happened to the person who wrote it?

There are things called Dumbleballs.{nl}According to some soldiers, the Siaulambs changed dramatically after eating a Dumbleball.{nl}It was as if they lost all fear... The solders said they'd never seen anything like it.{nl}

Fortunately, soldiers on patrol found the general locations where the Dumbleballs are held.{nl}If we can pinpoint the places and burn them down, then the tide of battle will tilt to our favor.{nl}Please look for an old wooden box at the 4th supply warehouse.
Please don't ever think about eating it.{nl}I don't know what the ingredients are, but you will probably suffer from a terrible diarrhea.
That's good. Please destroy it.{nl}The next location will be the 2nd supply warehouse.
It did such a dirty thing on our supplies.{nl}I can't withhold my anger.
Soldiers are reporting that other monsters are appearing at Amzina Curved Path.{nl}Please check if they are related to Sparnas.
Those silly things keep coming towards us.{nl}Now may be the only chance we have to go and get Sparnas.{nl}Tell me when you are ready.
They really worked up a bunch of problems.{nl}If they were to make their move on the lifeline supplies, I won't just be beating them with {nl}the bat I set aside at the middle of the market.
What? The Tutu?{nl}I don't have time to think about those insignificant critters.
When you level up, you can increase a status of your choice and become stronger. {nl}Would you like to try doing so now?
It's important to keep in mind what you want to become. {nl}That's never an easy thing.
Yes. That's how you do it. {nl}Pretty simple, huh?
Aras is at the center region of the woods. {nl}But there has been a tremendous increase in monsters around here, so I suggest you don't go in.
Somehow Klaipeda has managed to hold back the monsters for now,{nl}but we have to find and remove the cause or we won't hold out for long.{nl}
That strange feeling I had in Crystal Mine 3F,{nl}it keeps occurring to me that it might be related to that girl the townspeople keep talking about.{nl}
I just feel bad that I wasn't able to meet her face-to-face.
Thank you for saving the villagers,{nl}but you're not thinking of going to the Closed Area, are you?
Remove the final seal that is left from here.{nl}The odor in the air is changing. I am sure it's from a demon.
The demons are advancing. This is unusual.{nl}Even if it is sealed multiple times, I don't feel safe.
I caught the smell of Biteregina.{nl}I'm glad that you're safe.
Alright. The hidden door to the sanctum is now open and you may enter it.{nl}You should see one of the two seals that protect the legacy of the Great King Zachariel.
The only thing that remains to be done is for us to watch over the Great King Zachariel's eternal {nl}sleep. It was a real honor for me to meet you.
Well done.{nl}Morkus is waiting for you at Overlong Bridge Valley. You must hurry.
There are people who are after the Great King's inheritance.{nl}If the inheritance wasn't sealed away, those people would have taken them by now.
Because of that, a few disciples have died.{nl}But, that's strange. It seems that it never happened.
There is Gustas and then there is my senior.{nl}That means I am the youngest? No...
Gustas is proud to protect the inheritance of Zachariel.{nl}I wonder what he's going to do after he relinquishes that position.
Just how many things are hiding in this canyon?{nl}Could there be more of the king's inheritance here?
According to the old records, the king erased the stonemason's memories using magic to {nl}protect the Royal Mausoleum. I think it's amazing that he erased only those memories.
Liaison Officer Nian
You saw it, right? That's why I told you not to touch it.{nl}Because of this, we received an order to withdraw from this place.{nl}
Well, if I am to be involved in this, can you at least do me a favor?{nl}Tell Adelle at the Excavation Team Camp to watch out for this kind of stones.
We are looking for a stone with peculiar carvings.{nl}If you happen to come upon such a stone, please notify us instead of touching it.
Historian Adelle
A stone? I might know of it.{nl}Do you want to to know what kind of stone it is?
Monsters suddenly became violent and started attacking us.{nl}This isn't normal.
This should do.{nl}This evil energy... I'm certain that the demons are plotting something.
I'll consider you as a reliable ally then.{nl}You can get them from the nearby Hogmas. I'm counting on you.
Archaeologist Friedka
I'm looking for a certain unique stone pillar. But as a scholar, getting it is beyond my skill.{nl}If you help me, you will be handsomely rewarded. Are you interested?
I know that we received an order to withdraw, but know this,{nl}the reward will be well worth your time. You won't regret it.
Okay. First collect amulets from the Hogmas.{nl}After that, put those amulets on the stone pillar at the bottom of Geltonas Highland.

We should get out of here as soon as possible, before something big or worse finds us.{nl}I mean there's nothing wrong with research, but to do so in such a remote location.{nl}I'd rather the kingdom pays more attention to rescuing people than partake in these research.

Are you asking me how come a technician is at a place like this?{nl}As an advisor, of course. You'll need a technician like me to find out how this gigantic structure {nl}stood still for hundreds of years.
We will find out about the true nature of this place soon enough. {nl}It just can't be found with equations no matter how long you scrutinize them.
According to this map, the thing we are looking for is at Stone Pillar Hill.{nl}Alright then. Would you please make a rubbing of it?{nl}{nl}
It would be great if I could go.{nl}Too bad my body isn't what it used to be though.
Well done!{nl}I should get out of here since I got what I wanted.{nl}There is a mark here that was ruined by magic. I wonder who did it...
I must get out of here now.{nl}Maybe somewhere safe to continue my research.{nl}
By the way, why are these stones acting like this?
I'm sorry, I don't quite trust you yet.{nl}Come back when you have some more experience.
I just saw those villagers being taken away, and yet I could do nothing. I can't accept that.
Belief in yourself. Endless confidence. {nl} These are the most important things when projecting yourself in reality. {nl} That is the nature of Psychokino and the power that moves the world.
A Linker is someone who connects people with ropes of Mana.{nl}How strong the connection is depends on the quality of Mana.
Cataphract Master
Cataphracts have the power to charge though any enemies that block their way.{nl}They are brave warriors whom fight on the front lines.
May I help you? {nl}Fortunately, we have some potions left in stock.
Looking for some good equipment? {nl}I have prepared the best ones available. {nl}Look around, the prices aren't bad either.
Oh, this anvil is my small gift to you for saving me. {nl} It's a useful item that can upgrade your equipment. {nl}
Well then, see you in the mines.
Miners' Village Mayor
The Silverstream Gorge emerges when you go down from the middle of Twin Bridge.{nl}You will be able to reach Leaf Veil Plateau if you head further to the east from there.
Goddess Saule
To retrieve the revelation, please go to Fallen Worry Forest.{nl}Now is our chance, as the Demon Lord Bramble is trying to recover his power.
Royal Mausoleum Foundation Stone
I pass my words to the Revelator who comes here.{nl}I, the Great King Zachariel, sleep here to protect the goal of the goddess.
If the evil presence attacks, please protect this place by waking the sleeping Guardians up.
Royal Mausoleum Cube Manual
A Guardian who is corrupted by evil will forget its responsibility to protect the Royal Mausoleum.{nl}Defeat these Guardians near the large cubes.
Defense System Manual
A Guardian that forgot its mission to protect the Royal Mausoleum deserves to be destroyed.
Guardian's Role
By recycling the power supply of the Guardians that forgot their mission, we can return them {nl}to be part of the Royal Mausoleum.
Guardian Stone Statue
The evil presence has manipulated and corrupted the Guardians using their magic.{nl}Destroy the corrupted Guardians to stop it from spreading.
The demons are trying to take over the roots of the Royal Mausoleum.{nl}If the control magic becomes corrupted, we can't protect the Royal Mausoleum anymore.
The Guardians' corruption is spreading like a plague.{nl}We need to look for a special way to stop it.
We need to destroy the corrupted Guardians that are sleeping.{nl}First, collect condensed magic from the jars nearby.
I pray to the goddess for those sleeping Guardians.
We should destroy those Guardians before they awaken to the demons' commands.
Destroy the Guardians using the condensed magic source.{nl}If something interferes, destroy it as well.
You should destroy them before they wake up.
It's very sad to listen to the commands of demons as the Guardians of the tomb.
This evil is very real.{nl}It could possibly reach the deepest parts of the Royal Mausoleum.
Royal Mausoleum Blueprint
When the evil presence gets too close to the goddess' revelation, the Guardians are programmed to destroy the Royal Mausoleum.
The evil presence is getting close to the goddess' revelation.{nl}But it will never get the revelation.{nl}
Revelator, go and get the source of the Royal Mausoleum's power from the Guardians.
It was prepared to protect against beings that humans could not stand against.
Pour the source of the Royal Mausoleum's power into the jars.{nl}It will create a false revelation as a decoy.{nl}
The evil presence will never get the revelation.
The evil presence has obtained a false revelation.{nl}How foolish of it.{nl}
Put the Guardian's will into this jar and go to the last Guardian.{nl}It will give you the power to destroy the evil presence.
The evil presence will never get the goddess' revelation.
To have Guardians perform their mission, you need to correct the regulatory magic that went awry.

If the Royal Mausoleum's power source is corrupted, the Guardians will forget their mission.{nl}You can purify the Royal Mausoleum's power source by lighting up the stone lanterns with {nl}the burning stones inside of a Guardian.
Royal Mausoleum Regulatory Magic Manual
The Royal Mausoleum Magic Regulator can be destroyed while the Activation Stone is being powered.{nl}The Activation Stone can be powered again through the Royal Mausoleum Regulatory Magic Manual.
The demons have cut off the regulatory magic source.{nl}Please gather magical power from the nearby Guardians.
Good.{nl}The provision to the magical power shortage will now proceed.
A path has been opened.{nl}Restore magical power by reigniting the stone lanterns of the Royal Mausoleum.
When the regulatory magic flows yet again, the Guardians will regain their reason.{nl}But that will take a long time.
Abnormal Guardians are attacking the Magic Vessels.{nl}Protect the Magic Vessels until the regulatory magic flows again.
The Magic Vessels is like the heart of the Royal Mausoleum.{nl}It must never let it be destroyed.
Order will surely return to this place.{nl}But it will take a long time.
The evil presence has corrupted the regulatory magic flow and is accumulating in the Royal Mausoleum.{nl}Find and remove the corrupted cores.
The Royal Mausoleum was designed perfectly.{nl}But the demons' plan seems beyond perfect.
Our Guardians are under their control and are carrying out their tasks.{nl}This is our failure.
The evil presence has also corrupted the source of our magical power, the stone lanterns.{nl}Destroy the corrupted stone lanterns to stop the spread of corruption.
The evil energy is pervading the Royal Mausoleum.{nl}We can no longer remain idle.
Perhaps this place will no longer be corrupted from now on.
Royal Mausoleum Archives
A Wheelen's Mark gives us power to face against the forces of evil..
Venucelos are very brave and loyal.{nl}But, if their loyalty is to the enemies, they are worthless.{nl}The dogs who can't protect the Royal Mausoleum will lose the leash with the king's name on it.
Great King Zachariel was proud to create the gigantic Guardians.{nl}He even put secret treasures inside of them, so that only the one who destroys these {nl}Guardians could get them.
The forces of evil will never reach the goddess' revelation.
Coben
I am looking for my brother.{nl}If you can help me, I may give you a reward.
He was a really fantastic person.{nl}I can't imagine myself being like him.
Something is between the pages of this diary.{nl}A blueprint.. and oh, my brother had recorded a few things here.
I came here to look for my brother, but I am not as brave as he is.{nl}I want you to take a look at his monuments' writing on my behalf.
Yes. My brother is a thief.{nl}My brother used to come to our shop once in a few years and tell us stories about his adventures.
So he challenged the great Mage Tower?{nl}That's my brother! He could certainly do that.{nl}
The Mage Tower was a fortress that demons could not even try to approach.
We should look for the next monument.{nl}If the writing can't be seen clearly, rub it with Cockatrice Fat.
Mage Tower... Is there anything to steal there?
Yes! He would not stop at stealing from the Mage Tower.{nl}I will go to Negyvas Field first so follow me!
You came. The next monument is in front of me, but I am just a drunken coward.{nl}I will stay at the road on the left side of Negyvas Field so you go and check it.
It is a shame to look back once a man starts his journey.{nl}My brother would rather choose to die than look back.
How could he even think of using magic against the Archmage?{nl}That's my brother.{nl}
We should check by rubbing Hallowventer Charcoal.{nl}The next monument is at the right side of Negyvas Field.
He will do anything he sets his mind to.{nl}How could we have imagined that he could climb into the Mage Tower which even the demons {nl}failed to climb?
You have to concentrate magic power?{nl}Ah! My brother left me something before.{nl}I brought it to give it back to him, but I don't know if it's right...
My brother told me that it is a device that will charge magic power when it is installed at the {nl}right place. But he also told me that it could summon a strong monster so he said to to be careful.
The Mage Tower should let us enter it without any complaints.{nl}If I could find my brother with this... It will be so good.{nl}
Yes. The monument, the monument...{nl}There is only one place left which I haven't been to. Follow me to the Karsta Hall Site.
Soon I can meet my brother.{nl}Please check the last monument.
His mind must have been like mine here.{nl}A famous name can be a burden sometimes.
I am sure that my brother stood still even when he was confronting his death.{nl}But, even if we are in mud, living is more meaningful than dying..{nl}
I don't need this anymore.{nl}Take it. Please use it for more valuable goals.
So what should I do?{nl}
I will fight fire with fire.{nl}I will find the magician's weakness using magic and humiliate her in her own tower. Haha!
Stonemason Canolyn
Are you going to Fedimian as well?{nl}We are stonemasons. We were called to rebuild Fedimian and were hurrying over there but..{nl}
As you can see, we can't reach Fedimian even thought it is right in front of us, {nl}but those Cockatrices are a problem for us.{nl}Do you think you could take care of them for us?
There is no reason for those monsters to be walking around. {nl}They are just there.
Hey, why did you take so long?{nl}While you were gone, the monsters came and stole everything from us!
We can reimburse for the expenses for others, but what about the tool box? {nl}We lost Sprit of Stonemason to Moa..
I guess it's true, all things with wings like shiny things.
The toolbox wasn't there?{nl}Well. We can't do anything about it then. At least I can say we got our revenge on it.{nl}
Tara Miles
I'm a doctor who came to help patients in Fedimian.{nl}I have some problems, can you help me?
There's a sign of plague within those monster's trap.{nl}Fortunately, I think it's not too serious.{nl}
Okay.{nl}Let's talk again at Negyvas Field.
You came. Please get some dust samples from the Hallowventers.{nl}There are many reasons that a plague could spread.
It is important to cure diseases, but it is more important to prevent it in the first place.{nl}You wash your hands all the time, right?
Thank you.{nl}We just need one more sample.
This is an opportunity for us. The Big Cockatrices are suffering from a disease.{nl}Please get enough tails from them to use for our research.
Even if we fail at preventing the disease, we should be able to quickly make a medicine with{nl}our research results.
You got them. Thank you so much.{nl}You've saved many lives in Fedimian.
We can suppress the vicious energy if the magic of the tomb gets unleashed.{nl}I need the activating stone that is located inside the Guardians.
Secret Location Manual
We hid the secret treasures for the Revelator who would come someday.{nl}Find and absorb the Guardians' hidden energy to open the secret door.
The hideout of my brother, whom I used to serve, is located at the Abandoned Farm up north.{nl}Please get my brother's diary there.
Grita
It seems that there are more monsters here now compared to the number monsters that were {nl}present before I lost my consciousness. Did something happen to Gabija?
It may be better for Gabija to let her know that we are here.{nl}There's a pole that we can ignite light on. Let's go.
Good. Since she knows that we came, she will recover her health.{nl}Let's go up to see Gabija.{nl}{nl}
Guardian of the Royal Family's Secret Treasure
You are qualified to receive the secret treasure.
Denoptic is trying to control the defiled Guardians.{nl}Defeat him so that the Guardians will no longer be manipulated.

The magic regulator of the Royal Mausoleum can be destroyed {nl}using the activating stones found inside the Guardians.{nl}The regulatory magic of the Royal Mausoleum will {nl}then be released and will suppress the evil energy.
This evil presence left only names of the demons to the Guardians.{nl}The Guardians will destroy the Royal Mausoleum without knowing that the Revelator is here.{nl}
Stop Bearkaras, the final Guardian, before it destroys the Royal Mausoleum.
Stop Bearkaras, the final Guardian, before it destroys the Royal Mausoleum.{nl}
I thank you in the name of the goddesses!{nl}First, I'd like to request that you take care of the unsanitary Cockatrices that carry diseases.
This monster is called a Moa. {nl}It ran away to the Leipsna Chapel Site to the west.{nl}

The Royal Mausoleum Magic Regulator can be destroyed, {nl}while the Activation Stone is being powered.{nl}The Activation Stone can be powered again through the{nl}Royal Mausoleum Regulatory Magic Manual.
Did Laima know that the world would turn out like this?{nl}She is the goddess of fate and foresight.
It would not be strange if the world ended tomorrow.{nl}However, I just want to know. Why the goddesses disappeared...
Press {Img F1 40 40} to use your remaining Status Points on the status you want to enhance.{nl}
Press {Img F10 40 40} to open the Help menu for more information.
Press {Img F3 40 40} to open the Skill window.{nl}Use your Skill Points on the skills you want to enhance, then click on 'O' to confirm. {nl}
Find and offer worship to all the Goddess Statues scattered around the world while you travel. You will surely be compensated for doing so. {nl}
Press {Img F10 40 40} to open the Help window for more information.

The other troops are fighting at the Miners' Village and we are blocking the monsters from{nl}coming though here. I don't think the Vubbes are smart enough to make use of tactics... {nl}though I am concerned about that.
We have problems here, but I'm just as worried about the other troops fighting in the {nl}Miners' Village. Normally, they should have cleaning up by now.
Watcher Gilbert
It's the Pantos again. {nl}They even stole the working parts. {nl}Well then, we've got to take them back, right?
I could handle it myself. {nl}Those weaklings would come trembling on their knees to return the parts. {nl}But what if more thieves come while I'm at it?
Well done. {nl}Now attach this and grease it, then it should work correctly.
The Pantos hid some parts in the grasslands of Mieguista Slope. {nl}Try to get me those for the time being since it's urgent.
The Pantos think the grassland hides everything. {nl}I used to find that cute about them.
Watcher Matthew
I am looking for cable car parts, but I can't seem to find any. {nl}Maybe the Zignuts at Nepavy Grassland swallowed them. {nl}
If your looking for the Paladin Master, he's at Leaf Veil Plateau.{nl}You can get there through the cable car.{nl}
I want to go destroy those demons, but...{nl}the cable car hasn't been working right, so I need to work on fixing it.
If it wasn't for me, uncle Gilbert would have been going around looking through this huge area. {nl}I am really worried.
This is a sacred land which we have served for generations. {nl}We used to hold prayer and important meetings here whenever there was a disaster. {nl}
But the land has been like this ever since it fell to evil energy four years ago. {nl}I guess the elders couldn't have helped it either.
In the past, this cable car was just a rope with a basket. {nl}You had to put your life on the line whenever you crossed it. {nl}
So I traveled to Klaipeda and learned the skills to create it myself. {nl}I have to start looking for a successor, but Matthew doesn't seem interested.
Watcher Basil
The Shaman Doll is to be filled with Mushcaria's Enchanted Mane. {nl}The Mushcaria should be in the Tustanti Plateau, can you get its mane for me?
They used to be considered mysterious creatures, worthy of respect. {nl}But nowadays you just go a few steps outside town and they are everywhere, preying on people.
I forgot that Mushcaria was still alive. {nl}Anyway, you did a good job.
There is enough time, so go meet with Follower Algis first.
I am about to head down this path to the church. {nl}Our Paladin friend likes the word 'if' a lot. {nl}
If our mission goes as planned, then we will have no need to meet again. {nl}Well, it sounds like it would be unpleasant to meet you again, haha.
Watcher Allen
The barrier that used to stop the demons at Mazas Rest Place is broken. {nl}I want to fix it, could you lend me your help?
The barrier was made a long time ago. {nl}And I failed to protect it, what do I tell our ancestors?
I'm pretty dull and unsure on fixing the barrier, so could you inform to Kayetonas about it?
Follower Kayetonas
No wonder. I was bewildered when the demons suddenly appeared out of nowhere. {nl}I better let my brothers know about this. Thank you.
Watcher Kenneth
You can't let your guard down just because the Demon Summoning Circles are gone. {nl}We don't even know what caused them to appear in the first place. {nl}
Anyway, please inform Kayetonas at Flower Greeting Hill about this.
It might be a bit extreme, but I'm thinking about eradicating all the demon's souls.{nl}
After you soften the demons up a bit, use the seal's power to draw their souls out.{nl}Then you get rid of the souls. Would you like to give it a try?
It'd be better defeat the severed souls quickly. {nl}Wouldn't it be scary to see them come back to life?
Honestly, I had my doubts, but it seems to be working? {nl}Please let Kayetonas know about this. {nl}I think he will be pleased, he is in Flower Greeting Hill.
Now, I think I can live. {nl}We have to keep it up and stop the demons. {nl}Please tell Kayetonas that protecting this place isn't easy.
The demons are very strong.{nl}I will protect this place to block those demons.
Welcome, I'm glad to see that you've had a safe journey here. {nl}Before anything else, there are things about this place that the Revelator should know. {nl}
My old friend, Algis, will explain. Please listen to him.
I can see the monsters clearly from up here.{nl}We may get surrounded by them soon.
The pieces of the destroyed barrier are scattered at Mazas Rest Place. {nl}Collect them and give them to Kayetonas at Flower Greeting Hill. {nl}
My poor deceased father would be happy if he knew I became a Watcher.{nl}But, I've already made a mistake.
We can say it's peaceful for now. For now.
They say that it's one of the devices prepared by the first Paladin against a demon invasion.{nl}There are several of those devices so that Emerald Bluffs is completely covered.
If any Watchers are struggling with the barriers, I'd like you to help them.
I heard that the plan failed. {nl}I guess we have to do something before Gesti recovers.
Watcher Erra
What if one of those flowers suddenly bit you?{nl}They may look beautiful to you, but I don't just see them as beautiful.
I need the sap of Nepenthes, but it's not awake.{nl}I have no way to collect the sap if it doesn't wake up.{nl}
That's why I am thinking about setting fire.{nl}I hope you collect the fats by defeating Malidus.
Follower Rikke
The elders gave me many charms that will help me fend off the demons.{nl}I hope they help.
Those elders don't have any sense of reality.{nl}We should have gone to the church instead of those Paladins.
Good, good.{nl}Let's see if it can resist waking up.
Let's wake up the Nepenthes at Piene Field by burning it with this fat.{nl}The fluids will be of no use if they spoil, so we need to extract them while it's alive.
Only a person like me can handle that monster.{nl}What do you think?
They protected their regions, but I guess they came down because of those demons.{nl}
They're not listening?{nl}Could the Panto Totems in Valyma Sanctum be causing problems?
I will give you a stronger charm, so use it after destroying the Panto Totem.{nl}Just like you did last time. You got it?
Ah, and if a brainwashed Panto injure an attacking Panto, that Panto will be on our side as well.
As I thought, I still have some materials left. {nl}Thank you though.
Follower Alfonsas
Amazing.{nl}With this, my brothers at the church can fight without any worries.
The Demon Summoning Circles are the biggest problem here.{nl}If we scribble on the circles, do you think the summoning formulas will become tangled?
At the very least, the demons should stop crossing through after those circles are removed.{nl}Though I do hope for a better result.
They're getting swallowed up into them.{nl}Very effective indeed.
Follower Vaidas
It is reassuring to hear that Brother Tomas will be in charge of the altar.{nl}
Brother Vaidutis is waiting on the 1st floor. {nl}Gesti's barrier is blocking the way, but don't worry. It can simply be taken down by{nl}the power of the altar.
Follower Vaidas
I regret that I didn't bring enough Holy Stones.{nl}I should have put them in all my pockets.
The altars in the church are made to stop demons. {nl}Of course, only we, the Paladins, know how to use them.
Is Brother Vaidutis alright?{nl}I would have been in serious trouble if not for your help.
Follower Tomas
The Yognomes are trying to eat the altar.{nl}I want you to defeat them.
If I had any Holy Stones, I would stick them in the Yognomes' mouths.
Follower Tiberius
I am making a Holy Bomb to attack demons with.{nl}I can complete it if I obtain Purified Essence. Can you help me?
Bombs in the church doesn't sound good, but..{nl}I think the goddess will forgive me this time.
I want to test it out on Glizardon.{nl}I'll give you the Holy Bomb. Can you put it onto a Glizardon's back?
If you think it'll be dangerous, I will also give you Romuva Holy Water.{nl}When you drink this water, you will be invisible to the demons for a short time.
Run away after setting the bomb on the back of Glizardon.{nl}Look at its size. It will not be fast.
I only have one empty Holy Stone.{nl}Can you help me to fill this stone, please?
We can sustain for a while if these stones can be filled without our brothers' help.
It is a strategy to attack the boss first when there are multiple enemies.{nl}This time, it will be Glizardon.
I would never have thought that you would defeat them this quickly.{nl}Thank you for your help.
Follower Donatas
Thank you. {nl}This is sufficient to make a transformation scroll.
You can transform into a demon by using this scroll. {nl}Persuade the demons to go to the altar on their own.
I get caught every time, maybe the demons know my scent. {nl}I'm sure it'll be easier for you since you haven't been around for long.
Alright. {nl}I think that should be enough for you to grasp their nature.
The power of the altar makes conversion simple. {nl}First, you activate the power of Globejas Altar. {nl}Then, stay within the influence of the altar and fight the demons.
The demons have stronger minds than you might think. {nl}It will take a lot of effort to make them forget about Gesti.
Don't trust the water's effects too much, or Glizardon may find out about it.
I am thinking about an effective way to defeat the demons.{nl}You came just at the right time.
When you place the Holy Stone, it will absorb the lives of the nearby demons automatically.{nl}Defeat the demons that have already had their life absorbed.
You can obtain Vicious Essences from the demons.{nl}You can purify these essences at the Altar of Purification, which is down from here.
Oh, they will find out if you are not confident enough. {nl}So it's better to fight the demons to gain some self confidence before using the scroll.
Epigraphist Raymond
This isn't the only monument.{nl}There's a fine monument at Irody Square.
I wonder who mourned that traitor? Don't you think there would be a different reason?
Surprisingly, this looks fine.{nl}We should get ready to restore it.
His monument is cased with a terrible magic because he was a traitor.{nl}We should use that magic instead.
If we received support, then we would have hired mercenaries.{nl}Studying about the traitor doesn't mean that we praise the traitor, so I don't understand why{nl}we lost support.
Thanks.{nl}Achat must have been drawn to the magic power cast upon the monument.
It's kind of curious that something that looks like a tree stump would be interested in {nl}stone plates.
I am sorry, but we can't find the one that we needed among the fragments you brought.{nl}I hope it has not already been eaten.
