Ha! Take that, repulsive pricks. I'm feeling refreshed now!{nl}The materials and tents have came. And the equipments and supplies should be arriving soon...{nl}Finally we'll use the carts to... carts? carts?!!
Ah, I forgot about carts!{nl}I am sorry, but can you request carts to Pakelas?{nl}I can go myself, but I think I am gonna get scolded again... Haha...
Adjutant General Pakelas
Ah, aren't you that famous... Oh... It's so good to see you.{nl}Why have you come here?{nl}
Ah, carts... damn. Malt forgot them again... {nl}We have extra carts here, but most of them are waiting for maintenance, so I would check before{nl}taking them.
I must advise you to check the cart conditions.{nl}My soldiers should have check them, so I apologize for making you do it...{nl}I will scold Bran.
What?{nl}These are the only carts that function normally?
Damn. The materials and the equipment should be arriving anytime now...{nl}But I'm in a hurry, I need someone to get some Hamming Stem in the meantime.{nl}Ah, that headache again...
How should I scold Malt?
This is great!{nl}Ah, my sincerest apology for all this.
So, does this mean that you will help me?{nl}Please get some claws from Velwrigglers at Rajuma Curved Path.
Our Revelator is so kind. Isn't he?
Darn, it's just a graze, but it hurts so bad.{nl}Well done.
It will be completed if I have Truffle poison mushrooms at Ajidu intersection.{nl}I am counting on you.
Where are the mushrooms from Truffles you say?{nl}Look closely at their horns. They are actually mushrooms.
Isn't it strange that mushrooms grow from their heads?
Almost done.{nl}Please mix all the ingredients that you've gathered at the Altar of Harmony at Isdidu Fork.
In the past, the altar was the place to purify holy water or objects dedicated to Goddess Saule.{nl}Enough about the past, right now we just need to use it for a relevant purpose.
What was your impression when you saw the altar?{nl}I felt somewhat nostalgic whenever I see it.
Anyway, after mixing this, the acid solution will be complete!
Please melt the thorny vines with this acid solution.{nl}The thorny vines are located on the upper side of Isdidu Fork.
I hope the Thorn Forest returns to what it used to look like.{nl}Birds are nowhere to be found right now.
What is now the Thorn Forest was once a very beautiful forest.{nl}We, the Believers, used to hold sacred prayer ceremonies here.{nl}
After the Demon Lord Bramble came to our forest, it became like this.{nl}I can't even remember the last time I heard the sound of a songbird. How I miss the old and {nl}beautiful forest...
Every now and then, I miss what the forest used to be.{nl}I also miss listening to the words of Goddess Saule.
Believer Virgis
There's nothing that we can't accomplish with faith.{nl}If there is anything that we can't accomplish, then it's because our faith is not strong enough.
Believer Nojus

Revelator, please be careful.{nl}It seems as if a similar aura to that of the ominous voice is resonating throught the entire forest.{nl}Especially from the direction of Fallen Worry Forest... I'm sharp-eared on such things...
Supplies Officer
I am the supplies officer here.{nl}I received a list of neccessary supplies, but check out the length of this list.{nl}How am I suppose to handle all of these items on my own?{nl}
I will get scolded by Selina if I am late..{nl}Can you help me?{nl}I need Plantain Grass.
The people in charge must have forgot about our provisions.{nl}If not, do they think that we can live by eating nothing?
Wow, that was fast.{nl}But we're not done yet.{nl}If it could be finished with Plantain Grass, then I would have finished it myself.

What would reinvigorate our strength to fight is meat, good o' meat.{nl}The beef flanks from cows raised on apples are supreme, but there aren't any cows here.{nl}Let's try hunting Tinis, which have a similar taste.
If only the list of goods to appropriate was any longer, then I would not be acting so hesitantly.{nl}The Vubbes stole supplies before.{nl}Nowadays, it's the Zigris causing trouble...
This is enough. Well done.{nl}I feel happy to see meat.
So... We have everything we needed... I will check the list again and report to Selina.{nl}Please wait a moment...{nl}
Ah... They're worse than those Vubbes. For real!! The potion jars are all missing...{nl}Those Zigris recurrently steal things that seem unique to them.{nl}
They are more than just thieves.{nl}If anything looks good, they'll take it away.
We don't have to worry about Zigris for a while now.{nl}They will be scared just thinking about you.{nl}
We have everything we need now.{nl}I was able to prepare them by the deadline.{nl}I am relieved now.
Fortunately, everything look alright.{nl}Those Zigris... I want to show them how scary I am.
The Vubbes planted a flag at their camp not so long ago.{nl}Now they've been driven out and the Zigris have settled in.{nl}This isn't really noteworthy, what's more important is...{nl}

that they just stole all the supplies that I worked so hard to gather! I can't forgive them.{nl}Let them learn pain. Burn down their flag.{nl}In the meantime, I will... count the remaining supplies again!
Hahaha! Damn Zigris!{nl}Fear me!
Damn, I am out of it.{nl}I have a mountain of things to do, but the monsters won't stop coming...{nl}How about this? Since only I can do my job, maybe you can do something about the monsters...
Foreseeing Owl Sculptor
So you finally came here.
Before we get into the assessment, we should defeat the monsters nearby.{nl}We can't proceed to the assessment like this.
You are indeed growing.
You are indeed the person I was waiting for.
Okay. let's proceed to the assessment.{nl}You must awake the owls that will give you tests.{nl}Awake the three sculptures and try those three tests.
I am sure you can do it.
Examiner Owl Sculpture
I will wait at the assessment site.{nl}Please awake the other owls.
Thanks.{nl}You woke me up.{nl}Are you read for the test?
I will wait at the assessment site.{nl}Good luck...
You woke me up..{nl}You are ready to take the test, right?
Okay, then let's start the test.{nl}Please come to the place.
You passed the first test.
Please prepare for the second test.{nl}Please talk to me when you are ready.
You passed the second test.
This is gonna be the last test.{nl}Are you ready?
You passed the last test.{nl}Congratulations.{nl}Please meet the Foreseeing Owl.
Now proceed to the Thorn Forest again.{nl}Somebody is waiting for you there.{nl}Please put the pieces of the sculpture together at the designated place.
Please do not forget your valuable experiences here.{nl}Don't be afraid, please proceed.
You woke me up to take the test.
I've been waiting for you. I'm the Swordsman Master, the one who will help you.{nl}I'm not sure if you know about attribute training. {nl}
Attributes can give additional abilities to stats and skills. {nl}You can learn attributes from each class master by paying them silver.
You'll be able to fight easier if you learn attributes. {nl}
You've come to the right place. I'm the Wizard Master. {nl}I'm going to teach you about attribute training. {nl}
Attributes can give additional abilities to stats and skills. {nl}You can learn attributes from each class master by paying them silver.
Does everything about attributes make sense? Now you'll be able to fight the enemies easier.
How you become strong depends on what choice you make. {nl}It differs depending on your choice and thoughts.
Good to see you. I am the Archer Master. {nl}Do you know about attribute training? {nl}
Attributes can give additional abilities to stats and skills. {nl}You can learn attributes from each class master by paying them silver.
Mastering these attributes will help your skills in combat.
Willpower is the force that creates magic power. {nl}For a Wizard, there is no stronger weapon.
The archer gives an arrow as a present, but the enemy take it as death.
There are those who fit with the sword and there are those who don't. {nl}It means that you should find something of value rather than readily throw your life away.
A Ranger's arrows target many, not only one.{nl}
It's very likely you'll be exposed to the enemy when you shoot arrows. {nl}So my theory is that you have to use whatever comes in handy, like shields or stones.
One thing I'd like to tell you... I think your attack lacks something. {nl}If you learn skills, you'll be able to make more powerful attacks when you need to.
There are different skills for each class but you will be able to fight better when you learn them. {nl}Also, you can do a lot of things aside from attacking.
What do you think? There are a lot of useful skills, right? {nl}Using the skills effectively will be of great help in combat. {nl}
Oh, you said we need to assemble? {nl}Please let the Battle Commander know about it too. He's over there on the right.
Guiding spirits is an important task, but it's not a pleasant task.{nl}There's nothing happier than living right?
Blackened Boughs can be found when you defeat the monsters nearby.
Others are violent as well, but the Filibos are the worst.{nl}They are resilient as hell.{nl}I think I can relax a bit if they get taken care of.
Plantain Grass are all around here so you can easily find them.{nl}I'll be working on something else.
There are many Tinis when you climb up the hill from the road down.{nl}Eight big scoops will do.
We don't have time collect the potion jars again.{nl}Let's steal back the jars that the Zigris stole from us. They are the ones who started this.
Monsters really like the Soul Crystal.{nl}They become strong when they absorb its power.
If something goes wrong... then go meet the Gatekeeper Owl.{nl}He is most clever among us.{nl}May the goddess bless you.
Nice to meet you, follower of the goddess. {nl}Do you know about learning attributes?
Welcome, you who follow the goal of the goddess.{nl}Do you know about training attributes?
Now do you grasp what attributes are? {nl}Learning attributes will help you to easily defeat your enemies. {nl}
Healing and helping others is the mission of the Clerics. {nl}How can you ignore people seeking help in the name of the goddess?
People are still suffering from the wounds within their body and mind from Medzio Diena.{nl}They need our help.
I am sorry, but can you please find my companion, Badat.{nl}I haven't heard anything from him since he left to do some research.
I don't know where he went.{nl}But he will be in danger without protection from mercenaries.
Gorath was looking for me?{nl}I am sorry. I just need to find the rest of my research materials.
Thanks. I was thinking that the Tontus may have swallowed them.{nl}I promise that I will return to the Excavation Camp if you find them for me.
I remember the most of it, but those are really important research materials.{nl}They contain the information on how we could enter into the Mausoleum and etc.
So this is all? Hmm...{nl}Thanks for finding them. I will now return to the Excavation Camp.
Monsters will gain nothing by stealing these research materials.{nl}And yet, there are many people claiming that they lost their materials. Isn't it strange?
So you want to be our apprentice, eh?{nl}Do you know who we are?
We should ask for more when we are in times like this.{nl}I don't know what they are looking for, {nl}but they pay a lot when something is discovered at the Royal Mausoleum.{nl}{nl}
Good, good job. This will do.
Now go get me some lime from the monsters that swallowed some.
After making this, I'm outta of this town.{nl}I stayed here long enough.
Good. Go meet my partner in Pillars of the Courtyard with this.{nl}He is called Vincent and he is very skillful.
Ah. Welcome.{nl}There aren't any people in this world who can make counterfeits like us.{nl}
I needed someone to do some errands.{nl}Get some of the firewood that is scattered on the ground.
Vincent
Ah, so you are the newcomer.{nl}Come see this thing behind me and if the matter inside solidifies, bring it to me.{nl}{nl}
Where should we go?{nl}Are there more valuable places than the Royal Mausoleum?
You are very skillful for a beginner.{nl}By the way... do you know how we were able to survive in this world?
I am looking for the poles that were used in building the Royal Mausoleum.{nl}If you see unique poles, please let me know.
Aren't they amazing?{nl}I wish I live here forever doing researches on those poles.
They are great pieces.{nl}We should go to Zluges Historic Site.
I request for your guard one more time.{nl}I don't want to get disturbed by the monsters while I am observing.
Because of your assistance, the study went well.{nl}But, I found some traces of magics on them. Outrageous, right?
Ho. As I expected.{nl}The one I am looking for should be marked.
I am smarter than you guys think!{nl}Do you think I am gonna get deceived by you guys?
It is a real honor to be chosen as a member of the research team, but I am afraid of making {nl}mistakes.
A man with silver hair requested something of me, what was it?{nl}Or was it blonde hair?
Foreseeing Owl
Necroventer has obstructed the road to the Thorn Forest. {nl} You must defeat the Necroventer to enter the Thorn Forest.
Corrupted Owl Sculpture
Death to all who are resist Necroventer.
The Necroventer that had occupied Top Grip Peak has vanished.{nl}Top Grip Peak will become peaceful once more.

Revelator! I wanted to meet you for a long time.{nl}Pitt and I applied to the military because we wanted to listen to your heroic stories.{nl}But we are just standing guards...It's sort of dreary.{nl}
If you are okay, can you persuade our commander so we can go out to the battlefield?{nl}The commander may permit us to go if you ask him...{nl}And it will be a good experience for us.
Wow, you are my role model. I respect you!
I think something good will happen since I met you.{nl}Yes... something good will happen.
Hehe, I'm no different... {nl}To solve the troubles of this forest, I want... no, I was called by the military.{nl}
You probably saw them when you came a while ago. The Thorny Bushes. They are very resilient, {nl}but we have a solution. I was born here so I know them well.{nl}
Please gather the fluids that come out from Tinis.{nl}It has a gland that contains the fluids near it's tail.{nl}Be careful since it smells bad.
I can make it quickly if I have them a lot.{nl}Yes. Very quickly...
Wow, it's more than I thought. {nl}Please wait a bit. It will be done quickly...
Okay... When you pour this onto the Thorny Bushes, they will die quickly.{nl}Yes. I grew... ah, no. I made that. I can guarantee its effectiveness.
What a lovely Thorny Bu...{nl}Ah! No. What am I saying...
What was that? I thought we just needed to defeat the Thorny Bushes.{nl}How preposterous!{nl}
The herbalist is not here, anyways let's go back to the training camp!{nl}I want to tell this to Raimondas as soon as possible!

So you guys are the ones who wanted go to the battlefield?{nl}You guys have no skills. There's little to expect from you guys.{nl}And those pets... are you guys crazy enough to take those pets to the perilous battlefield?
What's with those defiant glares? {nl}You guys don't wanna accept that you're not skillful?
Okay. I like your attitudes. But that is not enough.{nl}Defeat those Golems at the training camp and bring me the evidence that you defeated them. {nl}Only then will I acknowledge your skills.
Fighting Golems will be easier than going to the battlefield.
Lads. You came. Show me the evidence.{nl}You defeated Golems? or you just ran way from them?
Alright! Very nice. I will acknowledge your skills.{nl}Don't ever forget. The ones who survive in this war are the winners.{nl}
Okay. Return back to Raimondas.{nl}Have some confidence.
Good. Have you brought the evidence?
Very good. You guys are the members of my camp now.
The feeling that you felt while you were fighting against the Golem. Don't forget it.{nl}Newcomers these days... I don't find any confidence in them...
By the way... I don't see that hairy creature that went along with you guys.{nl}Tell me what happened to it.
Okay. I received a strange report so I was wondering what happened.{nl}I heard the dead body of a monster was found near Morku Farm.

That monster looked like the monster you guys used to have.{nl}I will give you the first mission. Search Morku Farm.{nl}Find out if it's the same breed or if it's the monster that you guys used to have.
Good luck on your first mission.{nl}If it really is what it is, I'm sorry for the loss.
Ah... how could this... It's not true. This body must not be Spion's!!{nl}I can't believe it. Look closely, it must be a different monster.
No... No way... How could you be...{nl}No...
Ah... Spion!! How... Because of me, you...{nl}We are so sorry...
The herbalist!! This is all because of the herbalist.{nl}I will find that broker and get revenge for Spion!{nl}Where the hell is that bastard?
It's not your fault that Spion turned out like this.{nl}Even if that's your fault, Spion would not have died like this.
Okay. What happened to the monster's dead body?{nl}
Okay.{nl}This would have never happened if I found the identity of the broker sooner...{nl}Pitt, Bran, I am so incompetent... I am so sorry.
I want to thank you.{nl}You made them real soldiers.
We must concentrate on capturing those demons now. May the goddess bless you.
No one will help you even if you are defeated by Golems.{nl}You guys have to save yourself.
Well done.{nl}Let me take over from here.{nl}Those Siaulambs should practice running away from now on.
I can't stand this anymore.{nl}I will defeat it myself.{nl}Please accompany us. If you could help us, that will really help us out.
Thanks for saying that.{nl}I will wait at Malkos Felled Area.
If I was a little richer, then I would have hired a personal mercenary.{nl}It was my mistake to rely on the goddess' blessing too much.
I know many people are missing, but no one is trying to find them.{nl}They don't even know whether those people even existed.
In such a anarchic world, it's completely justified to hoard.{nl}Ah, forget I said anything.
Farewell to this land when this is over.{nl}I never saw that scary man before.
No one will believe what I saw.{nl}I learned something interesting from it.
I will lure Saugas.{nl}Bring me the poison from Woodfung near Alkune Stairway.{nl}And please also bring me the Spiritual Stone.{nl}
It's fortunate that both of you are okay.{nl}Thanks for recognizing me. May the goddess bless you.
Good luck.
I would feel more comfortable doing it myself, {nl}but I took an arrow to the knee before, and it aches quite a bit.
If you look closely at the stones across Apynys Habitat, it will definitely appear.{nl}I hope the artifacts haven't been digested fully yet.
The evil presence has caused the Guardians to break the Royal Slate, which contains the rules of the Royal Mausoleum.{nl}Defeat the Guardians and bring back the pieces.
Those Guardians are trying to break a stone lantern of the Royal Mausoleum.{nl}Stop them. They are out of control.
Everything at the Royal Mausoleum is designed for the revelation.
With the Great King's will weakened within them, some Guardians now prioritize the Royal Slate more than the revelation.{nl}It's tragic.
The rules of the Royal Mausoleum are in place.{nl}We can prevent the evil beings from getting near the revelation.
My wound is deep, so please pass the supplies on for me when you find them.{nl}You can find Kepeck at Apvija Hill.
I welcome you with our family's courtesy.{nl}To obtain the Great King's spell, you need to be more than qualified.{nl}You also need to possess courage and wisdom to release the seal.
There's a white oak tree at Zeme Highland.{nl}First, extract some fluids from it.
Preparations are ongoing to undo the seal at Awaiting Stone Bridge.{nl}Please handle it with care as it is sap collected gradually throughout hundreds of years.
This will be enough.{nl}Let's move on to the next step.
With this sap, I will prepare a crystal that can release the seal.{nl}In the meantime, please collect a bundle of Canyon Amalas at Pamirstas Highland.
You need to get one that isn't poisonous.{nl}You may pass out for a while if you get poisoned by it, so be careful.
Our family has been waiting for the chosen one for hundreds of years.{nl}It is a real honor for it to be our generation to meet you.
This is it.{nl}Go to the Broken Pillar Canyon with the Seal Release Crystal.{nl}The Disciples of Gustas will give you a very warm welcome.
It is sealed with two seals so that only the chosen one can obtain it.{nl}The chosen one must possess courage and wisdom to unleash all the seals.{nl}
Of course our family's men will guide you.{nl}We know that you are qualified.
This is a sap that we've collected for hundreds of years.{nl}Be careful since lots of monsters are after it.
The day for the Great King's inheritance to find an owner has finally come.{nl}Now, go to the Disciples of Gustas at Broken Pillar Canyon.
It's very fortunate that Jonas regained consciousness.
I was waiting for you.{nl}Do you have the Great King's keys?{nl}
Alright. Now you need to find the map that indicates the seals' locations.{nl}There has been a lot of false information going around about its location, so you'll have to check {nl}various places.
The map is something that should not be in the hands of those demons.{nl}But even I don't know its exact location.
Nothing here.
But, there are still places to check.{nl}I will mark them on the map, so please check all those marked places.
You found it.{nl}The inheritance of the Great King Zachariel is waiting for you.
This map contains all the locations of the seal devices at Awaiting Stone Bridge.{nl}When you unleash the seals with the king's key, you will realize what to do next.
He isn't breathing because of the poison.{nl}Hurry, borrow some antidote from the other people at Stone Pole Platform.
Have you gotten any antidotes yet?{nl}His pulse is fading.{nl}
Thank you!{nl}Fortunately, he is breathing again.{nl}
We'll rest a little more and return when he regains his strength.{nl}May the goddess bless you.
The Revelator is here?! Thank the goddess.{nl}I am Rexipher, a historian. I am studying the Royal Mausoleum.{nl}
We already have most of the answers.{nl}But for the last answer, I need to borrow your power as the Revelator.
There are things that only Revelator could see.{nl}The questions from the owner of the tomb...
It is so good to meet a person like you, I guess this is divine grace.
Alright.{nl}The next epitaph is at Serno Highland. Let's go.
I wonder what they tried to protect by building the Royal Mausoleum.{nl}I'd like to see it with my own eyes.
Are you okay?{nl}The next epitaph is at Dykyne Fork.
The god is quiet. {nl}I think the tomb will be the same.
It was dangerous.{nl}But conversely, we couldn't stop because it was dangerous.
The next tomb is at the left side of Dykyne Fork.{nl}Is it the fourth tomb? I'm looking forward to it.
What do I want to obtain from the Royal Mausoleum?{nl}That is a secret.
The ordeal of the Great King Zachariel is not easy.{nl}With the skill you have, he should have recognized you.
The last epitaph is at Apatinis Cliff.{nl}I hope the Great King Zachariel will understand our sincerity.
Soon we should have all clues.{nl}I am looking forward to it.
We finally have all five clues.{nl}Now let us begin the interpretation of these clues.
Is that so...{nl}The clues are covered with something so I can barely see them.{nl}
How about this, can you bring me the teeth of Hogma?{nl}I understand that this will take some time.
I will wait here patiently.{nl}No need to hurry since we have the clues.
Oh, I didn't know I could count on you.{nl}I will see you at Isvalyta Historic Site.
Explained about the writings on the epitaph.
Historian Odell
There was an order to withdraw from here.{nl}I still have many things to research on.
Are you looking for someone?{nl}Can you tell me the name of the person you are looking for?
Are you sure the name is Rexipher?{nl}There's no one with that name on our list.{nl}You could try asking the other people to see if they know this Rexipher.
I searched the list and asked other people about it, however...{nl} there's no one with the name Rexipher.{nl}I am sorry that I couldn't be of help.
Rexipher? I am not sure.{nl}Are you sure that's the correct name?
He must have a lot of courage if he runs around with the name Rexipher.
Hold on for a minute. I've seen this before from a book.{nl}Wasn't Rexipher a Demon Lord who is part of the army of Baiga, the Demon King?
Using the name of a demon, that seems like he doesn't have any good intentions.
Rexipher?{nl} The one with silver hair, wearing a robe?
He is a crazy person who can control monsters.{nl}He's the reason I'm wounded like this, and he also destroyed the altar which I used for research.{nl}
First, go to the Chesed Altar. {nl}He is also going for the Gedulah Altar.
Good. As it should be. {nl}First, destroy the Royal Mausoleum Defense Device at Sesija Entrance.
I caused you trouble.. I'm really sorry. {nl}
We shouldn't be hanging around like this.{nl}We need to go after Rexipher.
The seals that haven't been destroyed yet at the King's Plateau will block Rexipher.{nl}That means you will have enough time to chase after Rexipher.
Please head to the Royal Mausoleum.{nl}We must find out what Rexipher has in mind.
As Laulas' injuries are severe, I'm here in his stead.{nl}The seal is released, what exactly happened here?
Dense Mist Plateau. I never even thought of it.{nl}What are they trying to do by releasing the seal?{nl}
Rexipher will go after the remaining altar.{nl}Go to the Tzedej Altar nearby. It is on the way to Keturka Access Road.
Ruklys committed treason, so his monument saw prejudice and neglect.{nl}It was broken into five pieces, which all disappeared.{nl}
For now, one thing you could do is to try and find a Stumpy Tree in Balkonas Wilderness.{nl}With a wooden piece from that monster, we can make a divining rod.
I believe there is a piece of the monument below Seklus Bridge.{nl}But Achat is around there so I can't reach it.
The Tree Ambulo that live at Gaisra Hall Site like to collect pieces of stone.{nl}Perhaps the pieces from the monument could be there.
Hmm.. Let's see.
{nl}Ah, here it is. I found it.{nl}Now I can string the pieces together.
We are the Believers of Goddess Saule.{nl}We are here to prevent Thorny Bushes from growing in this forest.{nl}
If it weren't for us, this entire forest would be covered with thorny vines.
A human controlling monsters... That's the first time I've seen such a thing.{nl}Also, I don't understand why he even broke the altar.
The only thing that is known is that it's a seal that's associated to the Royal Mausoleum.{nl}I don't know what Rexipher is trying to do by breaking it.
Please get rid of those Tamas. They've been disturbing me.{nl}Before I even know it, they cluster around and stare at me.
The artifacts that Raymond is looking for are not there.{nl}I think probably Tama has swallowed it.{nl}What do you think?
I argue that a Tama swallowed it. Or do you want to bet?
It really exists!{nl}Is it worth a lot? I wonder how much.
Can you see the good source of money? I mean the fluids from the Stumpy Trees.{nl}How about we make money together?
I don't care what's it's used for.{nl}If I can sell it, then I'll be happy.
You brought a lot.{nl}Thank you so much!

I saw some fragments buried in the ground as I ran away from the Tamas towards the {nl}Crossroads Vacant Lot. I am trying to negotiate a deal with Raymond on those fragments,{nl}could you bring them to me?
It's okay if you quit.{nl}I can't do anything at the moment due to those monsters.
This is great.{nl}I wonder if I can bring these back?
Thanks.{nl}They even appeared in my dreams.
I will pray for the goddess to bless you.{nl}You should stop him no matter what.
I came here after hearing that her epitaph is here, but it will be difficult to find it all alone.{nl}I hope you can be an ally. Are you interested?
He is the traitor of the Kadumel Era and the owner of Earth Tower.{nl}He was branded as the best swordsman, even when he was young, and many people followed him.
He lusted for more power, so he started a coup d'etat.{nl}If the great Premier Eminent wasn't around, then history could have turned out much differently.
Ruklys and I were taught by the same teacher.{nl}That's why I know what he was trying to achieve.
We have no choice. We should get charcoal ourself.{nl}Those trees with long branches at the square at the brook will do us good.
This is almost like she's praising him. I need to get rid of it.{nl}Carrying something that praises the traitor may get me sent to prison.
The fourth epitaph is at the Shiluma Altar Site and the last epitaph is beyond Griuve Highway. {nl}Let's say farewell here, since I should also check them myself from here.
(You cannot read the rest because the gravestone is damaged.){nl}

As I walked this land as a bystander, I read the epitaphs of my predecessors.{nl}Long ago, Ruklys tried to accomplish a revolution,{nl}Lydia Schaffen also formed her forces, and they still remain to this day.
If you are talking about that epitaph, it was broken a long time ago when monsters attacked it.
But, I have a rubbing of it.{nl}If you could find my bag for me, then I may tell you about it.
Thanks. As promised, I will tell you what it said.{nl}
But I was ignorant then.{nl}I too might have believed in furthering only my own, personal goals.
When you use this collection device on those Stumpy Trees, their sap will be collected inside.{nl}Bring me their sap.
I'll be counting on you. The first and the second epitaphs are located near Virdului Mountain {nl}Cabin. I will give you the necessary tools, so please bring their rubbings.
May my tower soar towards Goddess Gabija and pass the answers to her.{nl}For that, I will not be like my predecessors and let my personal feelings get in the way.
When you throw this bomb to the long branch trees, they will burn.{nl}When you feel they are burnt enough, destroy those tress to get wood coals.{nl}
The third epitaph is at Kriakul Brook.{nl}Let's continue the rubbings with that epitaph.{nl}
I got my bag back with your help so I will help you again.{nl}
Go to Pelena Site. {nl}On the way there, there is the next epitaph you are looking for.
Let's see, it may take some time to put them together.{nl}Can you take care of the monsters nearby while I focus on this?
Well done.{nl}It took a while because there was this small piece...
It must be terrible to be remembered as a traitor.{nl}Even though he was a respected swordsman, the monument mourning him was shoddily built.
They even casted magic on the monument after it was broken into pieces.{nl}It's hard to find those pieces because of the monsters that were affected by that magic.
Ah, That's the thing I ordered.{nl}It finally came.
Don't you want to know what to do with it?{nl}I will call the powerful spirit from Dumbliu Pond.
Thanks.{nl}It will take some time to dry the waterweed.{nl}
It should be quite the experience. Look forward to it.
I need a live creature to sacrifice to complete this spell.{nl}The Lizardmen on the way to Dumbliu Pond will work.
The spirits are mischievous and primitive.{nl}The Lizardmen will work wonders for the experiment since they are very fast.
The Lizardmen that you sent to me were really lively.{nl}We are almost done.
Infroburks play an important role in this spell too.{nl}I will give you a stone that controls their minds, please bring me some Infroburk.
The Infroburk you brought me are not enough.{nl}Please try harder.
Well done.{nl}This will be enough.
Thank you for making your way here. {nl} I am Knight Commander Uska and I am in charge of Siauliai and Klaipeda. {nl}
The Bishop told me to send the Revelator to the Crystal Mine as soon as they arrive. {nl} The goddess told him in his dreams that the evidence of salvation would be found there. {nl}
The monsters there are unspeakably dangerous so please be careful.
All right. {nl} Oh, do not forget to offer worship to the Goddess Statue before you leave. {nl}
Also, drop by the Item Merchant for the warp scrolls I left with him.
Seems like you're really curious.{nl}Okay. Bring me some waterweed that grows at Kriakul Brook.
Please use this stone on the Lizardmen.{nl}Once you gain control of one, it will run to me.
The Kadumel Era was a period of turbulence.
Kadumel the Tyrant, Premier Eminent the Chancellor, and Maven's disciples...{nl}They all lived extraordinary lives.{nl}
There are many artifacts here that praise the heroes of that time.{nl}And there are countless side stories about them as well.
When you use the stone on Infroburks and defeat them, they will automatically come to me.{nl}I will look forward to getting them.
She is the most impressive archer in history.{nl}She defeated Ruklys, who was a traitor and a great swordsman, with a single arrow.{nl}
That's why there are archers who are willing to put large sums of silver into purchasing items {nl}that are related to her. She is like a goddess to us archers.
There was a priest named Maven in the past.{nl}He is the person who built the Great Cathedral.{nl}
Maven lived for a long time and had three disciples.{nl}The first one was Ruklys and the second one was Lydia Schaffen.{nl}
And when Lydia Schaffen grew old, Agailla Flurry became the last disciple.{nl}As the other two disciples were, Agailla Flurry was a great person.
She learned all the magic that existed then.{nl}She also built the Mage Tower. What an amazing woman she must've been.
Our old man always complains.{nl}Even when I give him the best things, he complains.{nl}
He always complains, so I don't want to help him.{nl}Sorry, but can you tell that old man there how I feel?
When he first came here, he had a hard time adapting to the new environment.{nl}I used to cook him food and make him clothes...
Why didn't Cahill come here, and why are you saying that?{nl}Well, it doesn't matter. Are you finished?
Hey. Since you came, please do some errands for me.{nl}You see that pile of lumber over there? Bring me the good ones among them.
Cahill is helpful. {nl}Except for his complaints..
What?! Can't you find more decent ones?{nl}Well... that's still okay...
Please give these crutches I made to Cahill.{nl}Well, where oh where did Cahill hurt his ankle...
Get outta here before I change my mind.
Crutches from Old Man Moses...{nl}I really don't know what he is thinking.
I didn't say it's over.{nl}Please get me the leather of Flying Frogs near this camp.{nl}
Why would an old man like me be trying to figure out what this does?
Darn, it's worse than the lumber that you brought me just a while ago{nl}Wait, I haven't told you to leave yet.
Believer Domas
I am going to burn the thorny vines that are blocking the road.{nl}Can you help me?
Please get me some Thornball Remains first. {nl}There are many of them at Geisma Access Road.
There's a demon that I want you to defeat.{nl}The monster is called Likaous and it is at Thorny Pillar Garden. It brings vicious atmosphere with him.
Now is the time to defeat it.{nl}We spent a long time finding it.
Fire will never catch on the thorny vines here.{nl}And I don't want to touch them due to their evil energy.
Good job.{nl}I was worried that you would get hurt, but I guess I underestimated you.
Four years ago, this forest was normal.{nl}But it has became like this ever since Bramble went deep into the forest.
Who'd have thought that they would be using the power of our own altar?{nl}I don't know how I can face the goddess now.
Believer Bronius
I only survived because of you.{nl}I should warn the other Believers to be careful.
Believer Jurga
I can feel Bramble is suffering.{nl}He is getting retribution for extracting all vigor from this land.
You're the Savior the goddess sent. What an honor. {nl}Are you ready to fight Bramble?
You'll need to be prepared if you want to defeat Bramble. {nl}First, take this.
It will be hard for Bramble to recover now.{nl}We can save the dying trees as well.
Try to hold it in even if it's dirty. {nl}This is the best I can do.
You found the revelation. {nl}Are you hurt? {nl}
Bramble. {nl}The poor thing was trying to go against its foreseen fate.
Old Man of Andale Village
So you're the one who wants to meet Goddess Saule. {nl} If you're here about the pond, don't worry. Our priest is working on it. {nl}
The priest is at Cerpe Crossroads. {nl}I heard he needed Black Maize Venom, so try getting that to him as a gift.
We would have never been able to see the portal even in our dreams if it wasn't for you. {nl}You truly are God's grace.
Andale Village Priest
Aren't these Black Maize Venom? {nl}Oh, thank you very much! {nl}
You can count on me on helping you meet Goddess Saule. {nl}Now that the Holy Pond has been purified, we just need to solve the problem with the Obelisk.
Magic letters are carved on the Obelisk. {nl}But some letters were erased since the Holy Pond became corrupted. {nl}
If the letters are gone, then we will need to write them back on. {nl}Now that you've collected the Black Maize Venom, we will need White Oak Sap.
I think we'll be able to meet Goddess Saule. We just need to restore the Obelisk.
Bring that venom to the Village Priest at Cerpe Crossroads.
I see you've completed making the dye. {nl}Now go and draw in new letters according to the faint patterns left on the Obelisk. {nl}
The Obelisk is located at Slepingas Stream.
I'm sure the goddesses will be very pleased with you.
You're almost done. {nl}After completing the rituals to cleanse your body, you will be able to meet the goddess. {nl}
Let us head on the road to the right to Indigo Trees Plateau.{nl}The village priest is awaiting your arrival.
Use this tranquilizer on the Black Maize and extract its venom. {nl}The Maizes need to be weakened for the tranquilizer to work.
Thank you! {nl}By the way, what was that vibration?
Andale Village Priest
You're the Revelator, right? {nl}Upents are preying on the village so we can't hold the ritual right now. {nl}
I'm thinking about making bombs from Languid Herbs. {nl}Please bring me Languid Herbs from Narvas Curved Path.
It is safe where the Languid Herb blooms so do not worry.
Glad you're back safely. {nl}Did any monsters attack?
Please get the Strongly Scented Soul Flowers in Dvyni Wetland too. {nl}Languid Herbs alone will not be effective enough. {nl}
I hope we'll be successful this time.
I'll do the ritual right away if we can get rid of the Upents.{nl}So hurry and get me the Strongly Scented Soul Flowers.
That'll do. {nl}I'll send the materials to the elderly, please go and get the explosives.
Andale Village Headman
Explosives? Ah. {nl}Go to the warehouse lot at the upper side of the village.
It's probably in one of the bigger barrels. {nl}Don't worry, they won't explode.
Don't worry, it's safe. They will not explode.
It was in a small barrel? {nl}I must be getting old and mixed up. {nl}Normal people would have been incinerated, but for a Revelator, it's different.
Combine the ingredients at the Thorn Tree Altar once you have gathered them all.
God or goddess, their title isn't really important. {nl}Eventually, aren't we all just one being? {nl}
Is this hard to comprehend? {nl}You will understand it one day.
Here, this is a Languid Herb Bomb. {nl}Take it to Melaginags Cliff.
Hurry now.{nl}We can finally end it this time.
This time, it can finally come to an end.
Hmm... So... The procedure is...{nl}Wash your body in the water, pray, and then...{nl}
It's too complicated so I'll explain it later.
Now gather me some Sap from Coliflowers near Rajuma Curved Path.{nl}The parts covered in sap are highly flammable.
Is it alright to walk over the Goddess Statue?'{nl}I wouldn't mind it. Why do you ask?
It will be hard without Coliflower Sap because of the rain.{nl}Who knows how long it will keep raining?
Well done.{nl}This will be enough.
Using this, we can burn the thorny vines blocking the Rustybe Dead Tree Area.{nl}You should be able to ignite them even in the rain.
Go up a bit more to get to the Rustybe Dead Tree Area.{nl}It was a real honor to meet you, Revelator.
You're the Revelator right? {nl}A very ominous voice is looking for you, so please be careful.
Have you seen my ring?{nl}If you see my ring, please bring it to me.
My ring is full of divine energy so it will be hard for monsters to swallow it.{nl}Unless the monster is big.
You found my ring! {nl}Thanks. Thank you so much!
The priests are having hard time due to thorny vines.{nl}Can you help them?
I will write down the process for you.{nl}How about you start by recharging the mana of the magic crystal?
Okay, show me that you can overcome anything with your faith, such as facing those thorny vines.{nl}You can't call yourself a Believer if you are faint-hearted.
The first place I felt the evil energy is Fallen Worry Forest.{nl}It is such a strong aura that it will probably continue to be like this even if Bramble is defeated.
I don't know if it's the thorny vines or the evil energy, but... {nl}this forest makes people very depressed.
I personally believe that one day this forest will be okay again.
Are you okay?{nl}I almost lost my consciousness due to that voice.{nl}Who is he anyways...
The evil energy is growing in Fallen Worry Forest, and our believers are growing wary.{nl}I would be very grateful if you will be able to help.{nl}
The evil energy is becoming stronger and the Believers are getting tired. The situation is bad
Thanks.{nl}I wonder what would have happened if you weren't here.
While the Merog Shamans are performing their rituals, you might have a chance to try something.{nl}Can you take care of them?
Thank you for your help.{nl}Now the demons won't be able to act so freely.
I did not know those demons could use summoning crystals.{nl}They may overwhelm us.
I want to study the Demon Summoning Circle that has been emanating evil energy and {nl}summoning demons over there. It's a precious sample, so please go gentle so you don't {nl}break much of it.
We should be able to find a way to use it.{nl}Those demons used our altars, so we can use theirs too.
Believer Onute
The shamans are trying to summon Archon.{nl}It should frighten them if you can defeat Archon and destroy their summoning circles.
Thanks.{nl}They will not be able to attack us easily now.{nl}
Thanks.{nl}The Believers are distributed to their areas so find them and help them.
If you don't have anything to do here, then it would be best to leave this place as soon as possible.{nl}It's no good for a person who doesn't know how to purify to stay here for too long.
Maybe this entire forest has become the origin of the evil energy of the Fallen Worry Forest.{nl}I hope that I am just being overly anxious.
Goddess Saule would not want the evil energy spreading to other forests. {nl}Therefore, we're here.
It angers me to see those filthy demons freely roaming around.
I gave up a long time ago since I can't see an end to that evil energy.{nl}I just think of it as my destiny.
Now we just need to find out the Merogs' plan.{nl}Until then, please defeat those shamans.
Goddess Saule said to absolutely not speak of our presence. {nl}She said it would only bring further chaos to the world.
This is all my fault. I shouldn't have underestimated it.
This will only end once the origin of the evil energy {nl}located in the depths of Fallen Worry Forest is removed.{nl}It is vexing to see that everyone seems to be so short-sighted.
I am okay about the sample so just break it so that it won't activate.{nl}I am gonna take a look at it myself.
I get angry every time I enter that Thorn Forest.{nl}How could such dirty things happen to the goddess' sacred forest?
Help me. Merogs are after me.{nl}When they are grouped up like that, I can't face them.
Great. {nl}Now we're going to destroy the roots of Bramble.
Believer Samantha
Whenever I try to purify the Thornbush Rest Place, those monsters attack.{nl}Is there some way to avoid them?
Monsters are becoming more violent as they enter deeper into the forest of thorns.{nl}Maybe that is because of the evil energy.
Now I can relax and purify Thornbush Rest Place.{nl}Thank you so much.
I think I can count on you.{nl}Please protect the altar until the fountain is purified.
Put Merog saliva in this potion and shake it. {nl} It will help you withstand the muddy energy of Bramble.
Bramble is trying to recover by ingraining his roots around the Thorn Forest. {nl}Cutting those roots will hurt him.
You mustn't let your guard down, even if Bramble is weakened. {nl}After all, it is a Demon Lord, no matter how injured it is.
Now we can make a full-scale attack on Bramble. {nl}I'll go on ahead to Giliaii Courtyard to keep an eye on Bramble, please come along.
The most important roots are at Sviesa Hill Areas and Tankinta Vacant Lot. {nl}Cut them both.
Even after all of the vicious energy is removed, this forest will remain as it is.{nl}But someday, we will also end that.
Believer Kazis
The Honeypin is hidden somewhere in Karadas Path, but I can't find it. {nl}My purification duties has been delayed because of that monster.
You will need to activate the Altar of Purification.{nl}Do this without letting the Honeypin know.
Are you hurt?{nl}I heard the sound of Honeypin's webs, but I am relieved to see you are okay.
Bramble and the revelation are in the depths of Giliaii Courtyard. {nl}It must be agonizing since the roots for healing the scars have all been cut off.
Don't forget to use the stimulant whenever you breathe in its evil energy. {nl}May the blessings of Goddess Saule be with you.
Don't forget to use the stimulant whenever you breathe in its evil energy. {nl}May the blessings of Goddess Saule be with you.
If you feel that you are close to danger, quickly run away.{nl}The place is more dangerous due to the evil energy.
This is the worst part of Fallen Worry Forest.{nl}Not only because of the concentration of evil energy, {nl}but your safety cannot be guaranteed either.
I am not afraid of dying.{nl}The Goddess Saule will guide me well.
Achat is the faithful Guardian of the Royal Mausoleum.{nl}But, once it gets corrupted, it will never return to its original state.
Broken Royal Mausoleum Tombstone
Guardian Shnayim.{nl}Defeat the intruder who disturbs the Great King Zachariel's rest.
Royal Mausoleum Tombstone
The Guardians will cause a disturbance when the magic that flows in the Royal Mausoleum gets disrupted.
Royal Mausoleum Guardian
Once a Guardian gets corrupted, it can never come back to its original status.{nl}Eternal slumber will be the only fate for that Guardian.
Corrupted Royal Mausoleum Guardian
Anyone who disturbs the King's rest will meet their end here.
Destruction by the Revelator is a preferable alternative to corruption by the evil energy.
The name of the Revelator has been erased and only the demon's name remains.{nl}You must protect yourself.
I have recieved orders from Goddess Saule to keep a close eye on Bramble.{nl}He is the source of all evil beings in this forest.
It was a real honor to meet you.{nl}I will pray to Goddess Saule that your future be blessed.
Do not disturb Zachariel's rest
I told you that there's an way to block those demons at Fedimian.
I pray that the goddess can endure until then.
Well done.{nl}But, this is just an empty stone.{nl}You can complete it by empowering it with various ingredients.
I will fill the Jewel of Prominence with Flame Vapor.{nl}There is a Flame Vapor with magic possesed in it at the reading room.
You should search for it hard.{nl}The Flame Vapor is not clearly visible.
This is enough. Well done.
Now we have to fill the Essence of Fire into the jewel, but it's complicated.{nl}
First, unleash the Flame Vapor from Jewel of Prominence.{nl}Then the Flame Vapor will collect the Essence of Flame that are hovering in the air.{nl}You just have to fill that in the jar. Okay?
Don't worry. It won't explode or hurt you.
Hew.. {nl}We almost completed the Jewel of Prominence!
I will collect the sources of the flame into the last pot.{nl}You can get them from the monster that has the power of fire.
Gabija will recover her energy if we could make the Jewel of Prominence completely.
Good!{nl}Now we just have to combine the flame into the jewel.
Let's go to the fusion machine.{nl}We just have to put all materials in it and the jewel will be completed when we activate the device.
We must succeed...
So this is the Jewel of Prominence... I can feel it's great energy.{nl}Let's quickly give this to Gabija. There's stairs to go up on the right side.
To find the Jewel of Prominence, just use this detector.{nl}When you use this detector near the place where the jewel is located, the jewel will come out.
The portal that you tried to open is the gate of lies.{nl}The villagers hear are the tricks of demons' lord, Bramble.
It's embarrassing, but I am also tricked and captured causing to lose my strength. {nl} Please destroy the magic circles imprisoning me.
The binding magic circles are located in Drugys Courtyard and in Vapsva Vacant Lot. {nl}Please hurry.
Thank you for saving me. {nl}
I am Saule, goddess of the sun. {nl}Everything is just like how Laima has foreseen.
Thank you. But this is not the only barrier imprisoning me in here. {nl}We've got to find the inspetor, Clymen, hiding in between the gap of dimensions.
Please bring me the sacrifice tools in the Grand Corridor. {nl}I will try to use the divine power that dwell in the tool.
Thank you. {nl}I should be able to work with this amount of divine energy.
Now I'll focus my efforts on finding Clymen.{nl}I'd appreciate it if you could stifle the evil energy a little by dealing with the demons nearby.
Just a little bit more. Please suppress the evil energy.
I sense Clymen's presence at Ishpirki Access Road.{nl}Hurry and go deal with him.{nl}
That is the key. {nl}Please free me from this cage.
Thank you in the name of Saule, goddess of the Sun. {nl}
It's a shame but the revelation is in the hands of Bramble. {nl} The reason he imprisoned me instead of killing me is to use my divinity to interpret the revelation. {nl}
But the Bramble is also not in its normal condition due to the previous battle. {nl} Please stop the Bramble in the gateway with my Believers and get the revelation back.
Please show me the revelation. And I will show you its meaning.
If there are any shrine offering tools around that still contains divine energy, then we can {nl}surely use them to find Clymen. {nl}
Lyliana
I wish I could meet my family that lives on Indigo Tree Plateau. {nl}I... I also wish I could apologize to my brother about the big arguement we had.
I really want to know how my family is doing, but I'm too scared of the monsters to go back. {nl}I just ran out of the house and now I regret it a lot.
I remember singing with my brother as we dipped our feet into a stream on Indigo Tree Plateau.
I just feel sorry to my brother.
Old Man of Andale Village
God looks after our village, so the water is clear. The air is fresh. And there are no disasters.
So the Revelator has finally come.{nl}Very healthy and reliable. This time, we can do it.
Aren't you the Revelator? {nl}So, what brings you to our village? {nl}
Goddess Saule? {nl}We haven't seen her for a long time. {nl}
The portal that leads to Goddess Saule doesn't open. {nl}I think it's because the Holy Pond is corrupted.
The Tanus in Zvelgian Vacant Lot carry Purifying Stones. {nl}They will be able to purify the Pond.
Just like there are many demons, the same goes for the goddesses. {nl}The five goddesses are the only ones who became well known.
Our village serves the Goddess Saule, who overlooks the sun. {nl}We used to go see her a lot through the portal, but one day that portal closed.
I haved carved the owls for a long time.{nl}At one point in time, they got their lives and determination.{nl}
When I gained my consciousness, a few hundreds of years have passed.
Carvers should be careful not to exaggerate their skills. They should be humble.
It is a good sign that you, the Revelator, came here.{nl}We've been waiting for you for a long time.
Please come to our village.{nl}The villagers will really like you.{nl}For sure.
It was through God's guidance that we were able to meet.
Please refrain from thinking about any suffering. We have all received a blessing.
Believe in God.{nl}We can become one with the tree.
We will be saved by sticking together.{nl}Because God told us to do that.
Not yet?{nl}Where is the girl?
I can't use my power since I was deceivied by the demon's trick.{nl}You should find my power to guide you to the revelation.
That portal is a gate to lies.{nl}Laima has brought you to me because of that.
Demon Lord Bramble can never be forgiven.
Bramble must be recovering his power even at this moment.{nl}Please meet the Believers at Gate Route.
Please be careful of the Beholder's tricks at Gate Route.
I am gonna stay here and recover my lost energy.{nl}I don't wanna create chaos in this world so please do not tell my existence to anyone.
The Mausoleum you should go can be reached only through the portal that I have opened for you.{nl}May the goddess bless you.
It seems that the rain just won't stop. In fact, it rarely stops.{nl}Do you think this is because of the evil energy?
These thorny vines just keep growing even after we cut them.{nl}But it's still better to cut them than leave them.
Even if Bramble disappears, I think things are going to stay like this for a while.{nl}The entire forest is covered with thorny vines. They are gigantic.
You seem to live up to your reputation. {nl}The people in our village just cowardly hope that the goddess will take care of everything.
By the way, did you see a young man from our village? {nl}I told him to go check if the portal is working, but I have not heard from him since then.
Thank you. {nl}The portal is at Nugria Sanctum.
Injured Villager
Thank you for saving me.
So you're the Revelator the headman spoke about. {nl}I'm fine, please check the portal up at the sanctum.
The portal can be opened from the altar at Nugria Sanctum.
It doesn't work? {nl}Well, that's going to be a big problem. {nl}
Could you let the elder of Rhombuspaving Dale know instead of me?{nl}It's a short ways up to the left from here.
That portal is... a fantasy... No. A portal going to Goddess Saule. {nl}Opening the portal is very important.
My injuries are not that severe, don't worry. Please go on ahead and check the portal at the {nl}sanctum.
I will move again if I take a little rest.{nl}But first, the portal...
Ah, so you are the Revelator!{nl}It's a real honor.
Monsters are trying to attack us, but we can't just abandon our purification duties.{nl}Goddess Saule gave us our duties.

The most important roots should be somewhere in Fallen Worry Forest, {nl}but we must have been poking around the forest too much.{nl}We could put a damper on the forest's growth if only we could cut it off.
We want to live quietly serving Goddess Saule.
Royal Mausoleum Guardian Stone Statue
The Order of the Royal Mausoleum is being disrupted by the evil presence.
Guardian Stone Statue
It is our mission to protect the Great King Zachariel as he rests.{nl}We will defeat anyone who disturbs the Great King Zachariel's rest.
We will destroy anyone who intrudes into the Royal Mausoleum.
It is our mission to protect the Great King Zachariel as he rests.{nl}We will defeat anyone who disturbs the Great King Zachariel's rest.
Wheelen! Oh, my faithful Guardians...{nl}If the chosen one comes here, do your best to give him the weapon of Saam.{nl}The spear that will break the armor of evil.

Venucelos are very brave and loyal.{nl}But if their loyalty is to our enemies, they are worthless.{nl}Dogs that are unable to protect the Royal Mausoleum shall lose their leash with the king's {nl}name on it.

Demonstration of Might! Does it sound beautiful..? {nl}Creating the gigantic guardians was what most satisfied the Great King Zachariel. {nl}Only those who defeat the guardians can acquire the royal treasure he hid inside them.
Guardian Stone Statue
Listen quietly with your eyes closed.{nl}The nature keeps singing to us the songs of lives.
Broker between life and death for humans. {nl}That's what Bokor is, if you ask.
You don't look like a delivery man. What's up?{nl}
There's no Long-Branched Tree head in here. Should I tell them to get it themselves?
Klaipeda is a small and quiet town. {nl}We haven't had this many people come to town before.
Did the goddess mention her whereabouts in a dream of revelation?
Go on ahead to Klaipeda. {nl}Commander Uska is waiting for you at the Central Plaza.{nl}
I heard the bishop also had a dream about a goddess, so it might have something to do with that.
Speaking of that girl. {nl}She simply appeared in our village some time ago. {nl}
She didn't speak and her clothes were all dirty. {nl}She seemed hungry so I brought her home to feed her some food, but then the Vubbes came {nl}to the village.
And you saw that the girl was imprisoned with us just a while ago. {nl}Do you think she has a family? She never said anything the entire time. {nl}
If I was a parent, I probably would be bawling while searching for my daughter. {nl}Parents nowadays are really irresponsible, don't you think? {nl}
The girl really did not speak at all. {nl}Furthermore, the fact that a young lady all grown up walked barefooted all the way to this remote {nl}village. Doesn't that seem strange to you?
Can we go home...
I want to go home soon...
I am curious about the girl said to have broken the seal as well.{nl}This is not a seal that can be easily broken.{nl}{nl}
Husband of a Refugee Family
I ran away with my wife to avoid the monsters.{nl}Goddess Zemyna is protecting us, but I don't know how long she can hold out.
Oh, the Accessory Merchant said she has a gift for you. {nl}Would you mind visiting her?
You can meet the Accessory Merchant if you go straight to the left from here.
Accessory Merchant
Nice to meet you! Are you the Revelator chasing the dream of the goddess? {nl}I'd like to give you this accessory as a present. {nl}
If armor protects you from physical attacks, accessories protect you from magic attacks. {nl}I hope this will be useful for you.
You can meet the Accessory Merchant if you head straight to the left from here. {nl}
Ah, I was waiting for you.{nl}Are you the person chosen by the Eyes of the Great King Zachariel?
Welcome.
Oh, it seems like you have some Jukopus leaves and Kepa stems. {nl}Can you share some with me?
Thank you very much. {nl}I want to treat the injured in our village but I don't have enough materials to do so.
I know you are doing your best but I will need more.
I still need more Jukopus Leaves and Kepa Stems. {nl}But I don't want to just take them from you. How about trading it with the potions I have?
Your act of kindness really gives me a lot of strength.
Thanks you! {nl}I hope it would be helpful for you.
Jukopus and Kepas appear around the Miners' Village.
Hey, are you going to take on those Vubbes? {nl} But your equipment seems a bit shabby... Do you mind if I help you with it?
Get me a few materials and I'll help you craft some new armors. {nl} The materials needed can be obtained from Large Red Kepa, Yukofus, and Vubbe Thief.
Large Red Kepa, Red Kepa, Yukopus, and Vubbe Thief. {nl} Not sure if it's a good thing but you can craft some pretty useful stuff with what the monsters drop.
I'll give you the recipe so try crafting the armor with the materials I gave you. {nl} You will feel more reassured. Well then, may the blessings of the goddess be with you!
I am looking for medicines to cure the injured.
Oh you brought it. {nl} This is the front plate. {nl} Keep it until we have all the parts ready to craft an armor.
Oh, here we are. Let's see. {nl} Seems like you brought enough of what we needed. {nl} You can make a Mantle with it. {nl} This reminds me of the good old days.
Ordinary Man
This is the back plate. {nl} I'll let you craft when we have all the other materials ready.
Here you go. This is a Chest protector made of leather. {nl}It was fun to do this in a long time.
(You see bone fragments in the well.)
I'm both furious and upset. {nl}If only we had gotten here sooner, we wouldn't have been totally wiped out... {nl}
Dear Revelator, I have a favor to ask of you. {nl}Can you recover my comrades' mementos?
It's bad enough that they were killed by the Vubbes, but even their keepsakes are being abused. {nl}How awful...
Thank you. {nl}My comrades may now be able to rest in peace.
Oh my God. The Vubbes stole all our food supplies. {nl}They even took our food for today... Please help us, we need your strength.
They stole the food meant for both the army and the residents. {nl}What will we do if we can't get our food back.. {nl}
Thank you. {nl}This will at least get us through the next few days.
Thank you for your help earlier, but there are more mementos that need to be retrieved. {nl}My comrades will be unable to rest in peace without them...{nl}
So please help us. {nl}If you can return the rest of the mementos to us, we will provide compensation.
Thank you, but we still need more... {nl} Sorry... {nl}
We've almost collected all the keepsakes... {nl} Please help us til the end.
It hurts to think about giving these keepsakes to my dead comrades' families.
Thank you very much. {nl} My comrades can now rest in peace with the Goddesses.
We survived the immediate danger with your help earlier, but we still need some assistance. {nl}Could you help us out a bit more?
I'm enraged thinking about the Vubbes who will be heartily satisfied with our food. {nl}Especially with such difficult times nowadays.
Thank you. {nl}We're still lacking some goods, but at least we got back this much.
Fedimian Resident
I heard that Sir Maven, who built the Great Cathedral, left five necklaces.{nl}I also heard that the one who collects those five necklaces will possess a great power.

Hey, if you are planning to continue your journey, don't get close to the Cursed City.{nl}It didn't receive a blessing at all on Medzio Diena. You will turn into stone if you get too close to {nl}that city.
It's true that I am looking for the Revelator, but I need someone skillful.{nl}I am sorry, but you don't look like the Revelator I am looking for.
The Great Cathedral, built by Maven, is beyond the Pilgrim's Way.{nl}Ruklys, Lydia Schaffen, and Agailla Flurry are all his disciples.
The Great Cathedral was significantly damaged on Medzio Diena, so I wonder if people {nl}still go there. Back then, a great number of people would go there to do various rituals.
They call the trail to the Great Cathedral, the Pilgrim's Way.
Welcome. {nl} Only hard-to-find stuff here.
Klaipeda Peddler
I came all the way from Klaipeda to pray.{nl}That another disaster never occurs, and that my son{nl}who joined the army will be able to come back and see me.
My husband and I come here to pray every time we come here from Klaipeda.{nl}I know the goddess protected us during Medzio Diena,{nl}but I hope she can hear out at least one of my wishes.
Don't you ever think about going to the Great Cathedral.{nl}Even if you prepare for the dangers due to its deterioration...

Yes. If you want to go to the Great Cathedral, you have to go through the impassable Pilgrim's {nl}Way. You see... the spirits of fallen Pilgrims haunt the area. They probably prey on passing {nl}travelers.
Vubbe Tokens, Panto Horns, Merog Hearts, and Hogma Teeth. {nl}That is a lot of stuff!{nl}
The reward that you'll obtained are not to be boasted about.{nl}On that note, let's continue with our bet?
I'd say the monsters at Owl Burial Ground should prove to be a fairly equal wager for you.{nl}What do you think?
Haha, I lost.{nl}You are great as I heard so. Here, it's your reward as promised.
I have buried a Revelator once in the past.{nl}He burdened the goddess and placed too much faith in his abilities.
It's frightening to think that blunder happened at all.{nl}I don't even know if I will have to bury another Revelator in the future... {nl}We both may never know.
Are you proud of your skills as you talk to me at this moment while time passes?
If a person becomes a handful of soils after his death, can you imagine how he will be treated.{nl}The soils that once conquered this world...
Yes. You managed to avoid being like me. Yes...
Without the blessing from the goddess, you would probably be with the goddess now too.{nl}Nonetheless, a lot of people are already like without such blessing.{nl}
The Chapparition of Remaining Tree Dale has claimed many lives.{nl}Dispose of that abomination in the name of the goddesses.
We can't revive the people who died by the Chapparitions.{nl}I feel sorry, but we can't just do nothing.
Innocent Spirit
Do not be surprised. {nl}For sure, there is something to given before returning to the goddesses. {nl}
I want to apologize to my sister who left the house because of me but now I can't even do that. {nl}Can you find my sister for me and give her this necklace?
My brother asked you to give this necklace to me? {nl}Where is my brother?
Innocent Soldier
You are new here. Defeat all monsters nearby on my behalf.{nl}I can't move somehow.
Now I can go back to my hometown.{nl}Do you best, newcomer...
Errand Man
What. This isn't the Ripper? {nl}But since you've seen my face, you'll soon be cursed to death. {nl}
Wait a minute. No. No. {nl}Delivering this letter will just make it bounce back to you.{nl}You'll have to deliver it to Ripper, the guard of Fedimian. Do not look at what's written in the {nl}letter.
A letter for me? I wonder what's in it... {nl}
A curse? Oh I get it, I get it alright!{nl}I'll give you his money, so please tell him to not curse me!
huhu. Poor guy. He won't be able to see the light soon {nl} Whether it's in prison or coffin, only he will know. {nl} I feel sorry for the dead soldiers.
Oh, I really am thankful for your help the other time. {nl}My injury is getting better now that I can move. {nl}
But, uh, I'm too hungry and I don't have the energy to go back to the captain. {nl}If you have anything to eat, can you share some, please?
Oh, thank you so much! {nl}I'll take this to recover and return to the commander for sure.
The young birds... they remind me of Sparnas.{nl}I don't want ever see him. Even in my dreams.
Hmm, alright. I have accessories that will fit.{nl}I don't need them anymore so I want to give them to you if you could take care of the {nl}monsters nearby.
Not done yet?{nl}They'll will fit on you nicely.
Yes. Well done.{nl}Here you go. It's a gift to you as promised.{nl}
Don't underestimate it. It was a strong animal in the old stories.{nl}In some places, one becomes an enemy to all other people just by touching that animal.

I'm sorry, but could you burn the funeral ode in front of an epitaph at Dense Mist Plateau?{nl}I'd say that you would be the most well suited to calm their {nl}spirits as you have explored the gorge regions from top to bottom.
The canyon area is like a grave for many explorers and historians. {nl} And we study to find more factual history on top of their graves.
Thank you. {nl}Our scholars will not forget him either.
Yes. The Revelator who said the same things lies at rest here.{nl}If you can survive after facing nearby monsters for 2 minutes, then I'll think better of you.
From now on, be careful when using shared equipment. Nonetheless, an impressive show of strength.
Well... just looking at it leaves me at loss for words. {nl}Was it really this fragile...
This isn't good.{nl}We may have to evacuate from here.
Deal with all the monsters that you can at Owl Burial Ground before you return.{nl}How about 40 of them? I'll bet that you can't do it.
I will pray for that monster.{nl}If it even has a soul to listen to my prayer...
Unfortunately... I don't know where my brother is. {nl}He also probably won't know where I am too.
I cannot leave until I have completed the mission...
He is so stupid. {nl}He could have given it sooner in good terms rather than get on my nerves. {nl}Hmm. Maybe I am belittling myself too.
Don't act like you know me! {nl}It's not my fault. Everything is because of him!
Is it ready yet?{nl}I could eat anything to recover right now...
Frankly, I'm afraid of what the world will turn into.
Cyrenia Odell
Hmm.. where is this place?{nl}What about Rexipher? Where is he?
Oh? The woman. I forgot.{nl}I will release her as promised. Do try to keep her alive.
Sincerity is our strength. {nl}There will be no problems if you sincerely believe and follow the goddess.
My throat hurts.. I think being confined in there damaged my throat. {nl}I wonder about the girl who was with us? Where did she go?
Aren't you the Revelator who saved us last time? {nl}We were more than glad to see you back then.
The goddess must have sent you.{nl}If you didn't come... we'd be already... It's too scary to think about it.
It was horrible in captivity. {nl}The Vubbes would come and smelled us.. {nl}and make us dig here and there using pickaxes..
Rexipher... Was he really a demon?
You saved us. Thank you so much. {nl}But I have a question for you.
Healing magic. {nl}Can normal people easily do it?
Okay but listen to my story a little. {nl}When I was taken to the mine, I injured my knee. {nl}
But a girl touched my knee and the pain was gone. {nl}Even the wound disappeared. {nl}
Strange huh? I made her a flower ring to give to her. {nl}But I don't know where she's went.
Good job.{nl}I will take the Jewel of Prominence.
Strange Sack
Found a letter in the sack
The letter in the sack
Receiver: Drasius{nl}Address: Virdului Mountain Cabin{nl}I am sending you the head of the Long-Branched Tree that you ordered.
400 years would have passed by the time this revelation reaches you. {nl}Thank you in advance for your continued pursuit of finding this revelation. {nl}

As I'm sure the demons will prey on the revelation, I will leave this revelation in the hands of {nl}Rimgaudas, the first Paladin. If you find this revelation, it would mean that he had done an {nl}excellent job in fulfilling his mission. {nl}
The demons have been chasing the revelation before I made this revelation. {nl}Gesti, the leader of the demons whom you have met is one of them. {nl}
There are two Demon Kings and one Demon Queen with many Demon Lords to serve them.{nl}Giltine is the one that rules over them all.{nl}
All these catastrophes are her plans. {nl}The disasters will continue and at the end of it will be the end of the human race. {nl}
My ability to see all of this have made my existence threatening to them. {nl}That's why Giltine is attempting to send me back to the world's waters.
Also, they will extend their evil powers to the goddesses who go against their will. {nl}
Now disasters are happening just as I saw them to be. {nl}But it also means that hope, which I saw further away, will also definitely come. {nl}
Dear Savior, our sister Saule is losing her light. {nl}Reach her light at the iridescent valley and you will be guided to the next revelation.
Revelation of Crystal Mine
Dear Savior, {nl}in order for me to regain my whole appearance and stop the demons, {nl}you must find all the revelations hidden in the axis of all times. {nl}
But only you and I can save the world. {nl}I will wait for you in the high gardens.
Revelation of Tenet Church
Revelation of Kvailas Forest
Revelation of Royal Mausoleum
[Tutorial] Mit Ritter Titas sprechen (1)
Zu Ritter Titas zurckkehren
[Tutorial] Mit Ritter Titas sprechen (2)
Hilfe beim Versammeln von Soldaten anbieten
Ablehnen
Mit dem Spher sprechen (1)
Ich bin nur hier, um die Truppen zu versammeln.
Schnell weglaufen
Mit dem Spher sprechen (2)
Ich werde dein Eigentum finden.
Ich warte und du kannst es selber suchen.
Schlssel, um die Karte zu prfen #7
Mit Ritter Titas sprechen (3)
In Ordnung.
Abbrechen
Mit dem Spher sprechen
Ein Befehl wurde ausgegeben, dass sich alle versammeln.
Nichts. Vergiss es.
Notice/!/ Spring, um den Angriffen des Grokepas auszuweichen!
Gefallen fr Laimonas
Was passiert denn als Nchstes?
Das interessiert mich nicht.
Nach den Gttinnenstatuen fragen
Die Strae nach Klaipeda (1)
Ich kmmere mich darum.
Die Strae nach Klaipeda (2)
Ich helfe gerne.
Klaipeda betreten
Mit dem Kampfhauptmann sprechen (1)
Ich helfe dir mit deinen Missionen.
Ich warte lieber ab.
Nach den Monstern fragen
Mit dem Kampfhauptmann sprechen (2)
Accept
Die Wurzel des bels
Ich gehe suchen.
Warten wir einfach ab.
Etwas steckt im Busch
Ich gehe mal nachsehen.
Des Bischofs Traum der Offenbarung
Ich habe die Offenbarung mitgebracht.
Krise im Lager
So etwas ist mir nicht untergekommen.
Das ist eigentlich nicht mein Problem.
Bedrohungen im Ostwald
Betonen, dass es wichtig ist
Ich warte ab, bis die Sache gelst ist.
Nach dem Bergbaudorf fragen
Gefallen fr den Bewacher (1)
Ich werde die Chupacabras besiegen.
Erledige du das doch.
Welche Rolle spielen Aras' Truppen?
Gefallen fr den Bewacher (2)
Ich erobere das Vorratslager zurck.
Nicht wie geplant (3)
Ich werde die groen Grauchupacabras besiegen.
Nicht wie geplant (4)
Ich werde die Weber besiegen.
Aras' Auftrag (1)
Ich schaue, ob ich einen Hinweis von den Popolions beschaffen kann.
Ich kmmere mich vielleicht spter darum.
Aras' Auftrag (2)
Ich schaue es mir an.
Ich finde, darum solltest du dich kmmern.
Nach den Vubbes fragen
